(name) Hmmm.I wonder which job would be suited for me? Maybe I can find one that'll give me some info on Aquadia.

Then Lucy, Natsu, and Happy came up to you.

Natsu: Yo (name)! Checkin out the job requests?

(name) Yeah. I'm trying to find one that's simple yet challenging for me.

Lucy: why would you want one that's challenging? Just go for the easy stuff. That way you won't end up destroying things and take and won't be risking your neck. Unlike this pink haired daredevil over here.

Natsu: Hehehe. It's more fun that way.

Happy: Natsu. Is fighting all you ever think about?

Then Mira walked up to you. When you saw her your heart began to beat and you began to get nervous all of a sudden.

Mira: Hi (name). How are you adjusting to the guild?

(name): Oh um....I'm fine. Ahem. Th-thanks for asking.

Mira: Please let me know if there's a job you're interested in.

(name) Y-y-yeah. Sure.

With that Mira left. Natsu, Lucy, and Happy looked at you like you were acting crazy.

Natsu: Hey (name). You got a stomach ache or something?

(name) N-n-no! I'm fine.

Lucy: If I didn't know any better I'd say you had a crush on Mira.

At this comment you blushed bright red.

(name): What?!? That's ridiculous!

Happy: He looooooves her.

(name): Shut your face cat! I do not!

Then you looked back at the job request board and saw something that caught your eye. It was a job that was worth six thousand jewel. Only you had to.....
115231121112221111.title: The next day

choices: Erza breaks up the fight and Team Natsu joins you on your quest
1152311211122211111.content:
(name) Hmm. Well this looks interesting. All I have to do is find a herb in the mountains of Hakobe. Sounds simple enough.

Lucy: Mt Hakobe?!? There's millions of vulcans up there!

(name) Yeah? So I'll just beat em to a pulp. I should be able to handle it. How hard could it be?

Happy: He's practically a second Natsu.

(name) Anyway Master. Mira. I'm taking this one if that's OK.

Makarov: Now hold on. Since this is your first quest you should have someone go with you.

(name): How come? I can handle a couple of vulcans.

Makarov: Because I don't want you to end up like Macao.

(name): Macao? Why? What happened to him?

Lucy: I remember. Macao went on a quest to defeat a whole bunch of vulcans and he defeated about nineteen of them.

(name) Wow! Nineteen vulcans!?!?

Lucy: Yes. but after the twentieth one he lost due to being so weak and he ended being taken over by it.

(name) Taken over?

Mira: Yes. and because of that he disappeared for a week. Luckily Natsu and Lucy went after him and were able to bring Macao back and got rid of the vulcan.

Makarov: So in any case, I won't let you go alone.

Natsu: Hey! If he needs someone to go with we'll go with him! Right Happy?

Happy: Aye!

Lucy: Hey! Wait a sec Natsu!

Gray: Yo! Natsu! Where do you think you're going?!?

Natsu: It's none of your business!

Gray: Hey you looking for a fight you fire breathing psycho?!?

Natsu: Bring it on you pervy popsicle!!!

Then Natsu and Gray started fighting again for the upteenth time.

(name) you guys! Wait a second!

Then.......
1152311211122211111.title: Find an herb in the mountains filled with vulcans

choices: Natsu runs off following the scent of the herb
11523112111222111112.content:
Later you were at Mt Hakobe, where there the snow was blowing and the air was stinging with the cold winds. A man could get lost or die alone in a blizzard like this. Thankfully (and unfortunately) you weren't alone. Natsu, Gray, Erza, Lucy and Wendy (and yes Happy too) were all with you. They were all helping you search for the herbs the job requested.

(name) Okay. I know Makarov wanted to have someone come with me, but how the frick did you all end up coming with me anyway?!?!?!?

Horologium (Wendy): Well to put it simply, Natsu was requesting to go with you and then Gray showed up.

Horologium (Lucy): Then Natsu and Gray started fighting again and Erza came in and tried to stop the fight. Then the fighting got so intense that we all ended up going with you. The girls explain.

(name) Thanks for the play by play. So Lucy why are you and Wendy hiding inside a talking cuckoo clock anyway?

Horologium (Lucy): He's not a cuckoo clock! He's one of my celestial spirits! And his name is Horologium! The girl exclaims with anger.

(name) Well excuse me! Says the boy.

Natsu: Come on man. It's no big deal. You should be glad. We get to show you the ropes.

Happy: Aye!

(name) Somehow that doesn't make me feel any safer.

Gray: Come on man. You should thank us for coming with you. I mean you could get eaten alive out here.

(name) Yeah. Yeah. And would you put on some clothes already?!?

Erza: Don't worry. The storms letting up so the search should be much easier.

(name) Yeah. Hopefully we'll be able to find the herb we're looking for. I think the flyer said that it's supposed to increase your magic power.

Erza: It does. It shouldn't be that hard to find so keep an eye out.

Natsu: Hey herb! Come out and fight me!

Gray: Would you shut up Natsu?!? How do you expect a plant to talk let alone fight back? Then again if it could I hope it kicks your ass.

Natsu: What'd you say frosty?!? You got something to say? Then say it to my face!

Gray: Then when you get a stupid idea to talk to a plant keep to yourself pyro!

Erza: Would you two shut up!

Natsu and Gray: Aye!

(name) Well I guess that explains why Erza came along. She's the only person that can keep Natsu and Gray in order.

You all continued the search for the herb when suddenly.....
11523112111222111112.title: Later at Mt Hakobe

choices: A wyvern appears and attacks them
115231121112221111122.content:
Suddenly Natsu screamed making you jump in surprise.

Natsu: WAAAAHHHH!!!! I found you to stupid plant!

(name) And how on earth do you know that? And you would you not scream like a banshee!!!

Happy: Natsu knows where it is because a dogfish nose is like his.

Erza: Happy. I think you mean his nose is like a bloodhounds.

Happy: What?!? I've been saying it wrong?!?

Natsu: Doesn't matter! I know where they are, so let's go get em! Come on Happy!

Happy: Aye sir!

And in a giant cloud of snow Natsu raced off with Happy following close behind.

Horologium (Lucy): Hey! Natsu! Wait a sec! Don't go running off on your own! The girl says worriedly.

Gray: Well I shouldn't expect anything less. I mean this Natsu after all.

(name) Man. And he's a fire dragon slayer?

Erza: He may be an idiot, but his nose is sharp. Stop staring and follow him.

(name) Um... Yeah. Right.

Horologium (Lucy): Geez. He's doing stupid stuff like this. The girl says exasperatingly.

(name) Lucy how long are you gonna stay in that cuckoo clock? I'm getting tired of hearing him translate for you.

Horologium (Lucy): How many times do I have to tell you he's not a cuckoo clock! The girl says angrily.

Horologium (Wendy) Now now. Come on you two. Be nice to each other. The girl says gently.

(name) Sorry, but Lucy you and Wendy can't stay in there forever you know.

Horologium (Lucy): Well excuse me for not wanting to freeze to death. I'll stay in here as long as I want. The girl says stubbornly. On that note I bid you farewell.

Then Horologium disappeared in a puff of smoke leaving Lucy and Wendy sitting on the ground freezing.

(name) What happened? Did the clock had enough of this conversation or something?

Gray: Not really. Lucy's celestial magic can only keep spirits here for a short amount of time.

(name) I see. So that's it.

Erza: Enough fooling around! We have to catch up with Natsu.

Speaking of whom. Meanwhile Natsu was racing to the top of the summit following his nose to where the herbs were with Happy close behind him. Soon he made it to the top of the summit. When he got there he was welcomed to the sight of a field full of the herbs they were looking for.

Natsu: All right! We found them!

Happy: I'm telling ya! Natsu's nose always knows!

Gray: Great. Now we'll never hear the end of it.

Erza: You have to give him some credit. His sense of smell is keen as always.

(name) Hey Wendy. You're a dragon slayer too right? Shouldn't you be able to track things by scent?

Wendy: Well yes, but Natsu's nose is way stronger than mine. My nose isn't as keen as he is.

Natsu: OK! Let's pick these things and go home!

Happy: Aye sir!

They were just about to pick some herbs when......
115231121112221111122.title: Natsu runs off following the scent of the herb

1152311211122211111221.content:
Suddenly a giant white dragon like creature appeared and it looked mad! When you saw it, you were nearly jumped out of your pants.

(name) Oh crap! It's a white wyvern! I've heard of these things. Normally they're peaceful, but you tick it off that's when it gets violent. And now that I think about it, it's favorite food so it's only natural that it's mad.

Erza: I must admit you're pretty well informed. I'm impressed.

You were right about one thing. The wyvern was mad and it was very territorial. Especially with the herbs you and the others were trying to gather and it no intention of sharing. Then Gray stepped up and put his fist into the palm of his hand and prepared to use his ice make magic.

Gray: Looks like we'll not only finish the job,but we'll get an added bonus too. Wyvern scales are considered to be worth a lot of jewel and this one's loaded with them.

Natsu: Yeah! Get ready stingy! We'll not only take your food, but strip ya to boot!

Erza: Lucy, Wendy, get back. (name). You'll be helping us too right?

(name) You know it! Besides I've been looking for a chance to see all of your magic. And I've been wanting to show off mine too.

Erza: Very well then. Requip! (requips to lightning empress armor) Lucy, Wendy, and Happy, while we keep it distracted grab as many of the herbs as you can.

Wendy: Yes ma'am.

Lucy: Wait a sec! Why do you always give us the most dangerous job to do?!? We're not your scapegoats you know!

Then Erza gave Lucy a deadly look so terrifying that it even made you cringe.

Erza: Is there a problem?

Lucy: Nope! I'm fine ma'am. I'll go!

(name) thinkning: So that's Erza's magic. I think it's called Requipping.

Erza: OK. Let's do this!

Natsu and Gray: Here we go!

(name) Time to kick it's ass!

and then the fight begins......
1152311211122211111221.title: A wyvern appears and attacks them

11523112111222111112211.content:
You, Erza, Natsu, and Gray charged into battle with the wyvern while Lucy, Wendy and Happy went to get the herbs while they were distracted. Natsu went first on the attack. He gathered all of his flames in both of his hands and put them together in a giant ball of flame and launched it at the wyvern.

Natsu: FIRE DRAGON BRILLIANT FLAME!!!

The attack was right on the mark, but the wyvern deflected it with ease. To make matters worse it was heading straight for Wendy, Lucy and Happy. They barely managed to escape just before the blast hit them.

Wendy: Eeek!! Look out!!!

Lucy: Why do these things always happen to us?!?

Meanwhile the battle continued. Gray this time went on the attack. He created a giant spinning ice disk, which was like a giant buzzsaw and then he launched it at the wyvern.

Gray: ICE MAKE SAUCER!!!

The wyvern was able to deflect this time too. And once again the attack deflected straight at Lucy and her squad. The attack barely missed Lucy by a hair. If she had gotten hit by the attack she would have been sliced in half.

Lucy: Waaaaahhhhh!! Hey! COuld you hit the wyvern and not me?!?!?

But sadly her voice could not be heard. Erza had now leaped into the fray. Her launched a powerful lightning attack using her staff. The wyvern quickly flew up and dodged it with ease. Unfortunately for Natsu and Gray, they got hit with the attack instead. They ended up getting barbecued and well done.

Erza: Idiots! Don't you know how to dodge?!? You both should've been able to dodge that attack with ease!

Gray: (cough) We can. It's just....

Natsu: The attack was too fast. (cough)

Then the wyvern turned to attack Erza. Erza was able to save herself by blocking the attack, but even you could see that the wyvern was beginning to overwhelm her. You had to do something to help her. Besides you couldn't just stand there and let Natsu and the others have all the fun. It was time for you to step in and get into the brawl.

(name) Hey Erza! Save some for me! It's time I show you what a water dragon slayer can really do!

You charged your energy and water enveloped your fists and you unleashed a giant shockwave with both of your hands.

(name) WATER DRAGON WING ATTACK!!!

You attack hit the wyvern square in the face. The attack made the wyvern step back in recoil and it got even madder.

Erza: Nice work (name). Pretty impressive power.

(name): Thanks. You haven't seen nothing yet!

Suddenly Gray appeared from nowhere and froze the wyvern's foot making the beast incapable of moving.

Gray: Hey guys! Now your chance to attack! Do it now!

Natsu: Right!

Erza: Consider it done.

(name): Let's go!

Then all three of you went into battle with all three of you attacking the wyvern simultaneously. Meanwhile Lucy, Wendy, and Happy were gathering as many herbs as they could find. They managed to grab a full basket full. Suddenly there was a rumbling noise it grew louder and louder until just when you all defeated the wyvern, Lucy and Wendy screamed something that made you jump.

Lucy: AVALANCHE!!!!!

You all turned to where they all screamed and sure enough there was a giant avalanche coming straight toward all of you. Then.....
11523112111222111112211.title: The fight

choices: Mira. She was going to sing a song.
115231121112221111122112.content:
The avalanche came upon you all in an instant, before you all had a chance to react. When the smoke cleared everyone managed to get safely away and were unharmed.

Erza: Is everyone OK?

Everyone said they were fine. Natsu on the other hand wasn't fine. He face was blue and he looked like he was going to puke.

(name) Natsu?!? Are you OK? You look like you're gonna hurl!

Gray: He's fine.

(name) What are you saying Gray?!? He doesn't look fine to me!

Erza: It happens on a regular basis.

(name): What do you mean?

Happy: You see Natsu gets motion sickness, whenever he rides vehicles.

(name): Seriously?!? But....this isn't even close to being a vehicle!!! Last time I checked a vehicle is supposed to have wheels and has to be a mode of transportation! And an avalanche doesn't even count!

Gray: We know. We don't even know why he gets sick half the time either.

Natsu: Breech.... I feel......so sick.......ulp....

Then you realized that someone was missing and that someone was Lucy.

(name) Wait a second! Lucy where are you?!?

Then you look and you see a trembling hand with one of the herbs in her hand. There was Lucy buried in the snow shivering her butt off.

Lucy: Am....over here...but just barely.....

(name) Dah!!! Lucy!!!

Later back at the guild, you all managed to complete the job, but unfortunately in Lucy's case she had almost frozen to death. Luckily you knew some magic and you were able warm her up.

Lucy: Whew. Thanks (name). I owe you one.

(name) It's no problem.

Wendy: That's so cool. You can use healing magic just like me.

Natsu: Wow! It's like your twinsies!

(name) Natsu. You are to refrain from speaking.

Erza: I take it your dragon taught you how to use that magic?

(name) Yeah. When I was little Aquadia taught me everything about water dragon slayer magic. Even healing magic. I can even use water to heal.

Lucy: Wow! That's so cool.

Suddenly everyone began to gather around the stage for some reason. You look and you see.....

Anyway after that you went back to the apartment where Lucy lived. She had set you up for a place to live after you had joined the guild. Like her you had to pay seven thousand jewel per month, but it was worth it.
115231121112221111122112.title: other

choices: You were looking at the request board for a job.
You were sitting on a table because you were bored
1152311211122211111221121.content:
Sure enough when the lights went off and the lights pointed to the stage, there on stage and the center of attention was no other than your crush. Mira.

(name) Mira?!? What the heck is she doing up there?

MIra: Oh hey guys! Glad you made it back safely. How did your first job go (name)?

(name): Well, it was okay. More or less. More importantly what's with the stage and what are you doing?

Lucy: Since we have a stage, we like to sing or show off our talent sometimes. It's a lot of fun. Although I've never been up there since the Ms. Fairy Tail contest.

(name): Really? You guys sure know how to have fun.

Mira: We sure do. So, in honor of (name) recently joining the guild and for completing his first job, I want to dedicate this song to him and to the strongest team in Fairy Tail.

Everyone cheered and Mira sang this song.

Song for the Road by Mirajane

As I walk past....your room,
my shadow falls through your door.
One more day you're not here,
When will my time...pass by?
Gazing up at the stars above,
I pray that they guide...your way.
Just look up and follow the starlight that follows each moon...
So when you're voice begins to fill with tears
Look up and when
The light begins to shine from above,
I'll be waiting here...under the starry sky,
To light your pathway just count on the stars
Follow them to your door..
...Follow them home...

During the song, you were completely absorbed into Mira's voice. You felt that you fell even deeper in love than you were before. It touched a deep feeling in your heart. It was a song that moved you so much that you almost started crying. You felt a tear on your right eye, but you quickly wiped it away. When Mira was done singing everyone cheered for her incredible performance, especially you.

(name): Wow. She's amazing.

Lucy: Yup. Mira is one of most beautiful girls in the entire guild. She's also our guild's poster girl in Sorcerer Weekly.

(name) Whoa. I didn't know she was that popular.

Then the lights went off again, which meant that another performance was gonna go down. This time, it was Gajeel. Instead of his usual attire, he was wearing a white tuxedo with a red bow tie. Unfortunately, his singing talent was less than stellar. When he started singing everyone started throwing food at him to try to get him off the stage. When you saw him, you were pretty shocked and surprised.

(name) Is that Gajeel?!? And why the hell is he dressed like that?!?

Levy: That's......Gajeel's alter ego when he gets on the stage. Mr. Shoobidobop.

(name): Seriously?

Levy: Unfortunately.

Natsu (covering ears): Man! No matter how many times I hear it, It's still the worst song I've ever heard!

Suddenly the guitar Gajeel had went flying and hit Natsu square in the face. And that was straw that broke the camel's back. Natsu and Gajeel went at it like two charging bulls. The fighting got so intense the fight headed straight toward you. You quickly jumped out of the way, before you ended up getting into the crossfire. Then a beer mug hit Natsu square on the cheek.

Natsu: HEY! Which one of you punks threw that huh?!?

Gray: Natsu! Knock it off already!

Soon one by one, every single male was locked into a slug fest.

(name) Hey! Shouldn't we stop them or something?!?

Erza: This is nothing new. Just let them have at it.

(name) But Erza.....

Before you could protest a chair came flying and bonked Erza on the head. She simply ignored it. Then another flying from out of nowhere it her on the head again. This time it was a barrel. Again she ignored it. Then a chair hit her and that's when Erza got a little annoyed.

Erza: Would you stop all of you stop fighting!?! I thought the master taught you all......GAH!!!

Before Erza could finish her sentence, a table came flying and hit her square in the face. Now, Erza was mad.

Erza: Very well then. I GUESS I"LL HAVE TO TEACH YOU AGAIN!!!!

And with that, Erza jumped into the fray. All you could do was stand there and watch the scene before you.

(name) Oh man. What a bunch of psychos. Can't we all just get along?!?

Sadly your words would fall on deaf ears as the fighting continued.

The next day.....
1152311211122211111221121.title: Mira. She was going to sing a song.

11523112111222111112211212.content:
The next day things were a little slow for you. You were getting used to all the jobs that Fairy Tail did, and you got paid really well, but soon you were getting bored of doing the little stuff. So you decided to take a break and just sit around thinking about what you should do next.

(name): I'm pretty much used to everything in the guild, but I was hoping when I joined I would find some information about Aquadia. Not even Natsu and the other dragon slayers know what happened to their dragons. I just wish I knew where I could find Aquadia. Aquadia.......where are you?

Just then, a young woman sat next to you chugging a bottle of beer. She was Cana Alberona. She is well known throughout the guild as Fairy Tail's heaviest drinker.

(name): Oh hey Cana. What's up?

Cana: (groans) I need a man.

(name): A man? What do you mean by that?

Cana: Well I need a boyfriend. I mean I've been single for quite a while and I'm starting to get the urge if you know what I mean.

At first you didn't understand what Cana meant, but after a moment you caught on and you face flushed red.

Cana: Huh? Why did that make you blush (name)?

(name) looks away: No I'm not! I'm not blushing!

Cana: Haha. Oh come on water boy. You've had a girlfriend before right?

(name) Of course I have! Like....uh....two! Yeah that's it two!

Cana: Two? Yeah right. You're so lying. Haven't you ever been on a date with a girl before? Heck have you ever even wanted to date a girl?

(name): Well, to be perfectly honest I've never even considered dating a girl before. I've never really thought about dating, because of my search for Aqaudia. Besides, I don't think any girl would want to date a dragon slayer like me. It's....not meant to be I guess.

Suddenly Cana shouted so that everyone in the guild could hear.

Cana: Hey everybody! Listen to this! Our newest guy in the guild has just told me that he's never had a girlfriend before!

(name): Cana!!!

Macao: Oh come on Cana, cut the kid some slack would ya? Although he's is young, so it's normal for a guy like him to be single.

Wakaba: Speaking of which. Hey Mira, how would you like to go on a date with me?

(name): Now hold on Wakaba...!

Before you could protest about Wakaba asking out your crush, Mira used a transformation spell. Her face was now chubby and her hair was brown and was in an afro. When you saw this transformation, you and Wakaba nearly fell off the edge of your seats.

(name) What the heck!?!?

Mira: Sorry Wakaba, but there's one problem. You already have a wife.

Wakaba: Hey! Stop that! You know that creeps me out!

Everyone laughed. You breathed a sigh of relief, happy that Mira turned Wakaba down.

Cana: Hey (name). What's up? You look like your jealous or something.

(name): No I'm not! I just don't want Wakaba flirting with girls that are twenty years younger than him that's all!

Cana: Uh huh. Anyway, listen you don't need to worry about being single anymore.

(name) And why is that?

Then Cana held up a fortune telling card that had an arrow with a heart at it's point.

Cana: Because the cards have spoken to me and they're saying that you'll have a fateful encounter today.

(name) Huh? Me? Seriously?

(name) thinking: No way. It's gotta be a prank. But then again, Cana's predictions are usually spot on considering that she's a master of card magic. I wonder if she prediction will come true?

Just then someone ran by you that interrupted your thoughts. It was.....
11523112111222111112211212.title: Destined to fall in love

115231121112221111122112121.content:
Just then someone ran by you that interrupted your thoughts. It was Lucy, but she was different. She was wearing a sexy red dress and her hair was in a ponytail.

(name): Hey Lucy! What's with the getup?

Lucy: Sorry! Gotta get ready! Oh man! My hair is a mess! I know! Maybe I can get Cancer to help me out!

And with that Lucy ran off, leaving you completely confused.

(name) What the....? What's with her?

Then you saw Erza. She was in a tizzy just like Lucy. Only she was wearing a purple dress and had her hair tied in a bun.

(name) Erza! You too? What are you...?

Erza: No time to talk! I have to hurry and get my makeup on!

Then she ran off too. At this point you were confused as to why even Erza was acting so strange. And it wasn't just her, everyone in the guild was getting ready for something. Even Gajeel dressed up as Mr. Shoobidobop was rehearsing for something.

(name) What the heck is going on here? Everyone is acting even more stranger than usual. I wonder why.

Just then Makarov came up to you.

Makarov: (name). How are you today my boy?

(name): I'm fine sir, but what the heck is going on here? Everyone in the guild acting stranger than usual.

Makarov: You didn't know? Well, you're new to the guild so that's to be expected. Anyway a reporter from Sorcerer Weekly magazine is coming by later to do an interview with us.

(name): No way! That's like the most popular magazine around! (At least as far as I know.)

For those who don't know, Sorcerer Weekly is a magazine that details all about guilds and their functions. It's published every Wednesday. They introduce new hot magic items and popular conferences, as well as publish photos of popular Mages.

Makarov: That's right. So get ready and be sure to make a good impression OK?

And with that Makarov left. You were left alone in your thoughts.

(name) Oh man. So that's why everyone's freaking out. Well I'll just leave them alone.

Then you remembered what Cana said about your fateful encounter. When you thought about that you began to think about Mira and blushed.

(name): Wait a second! Maybe my fateful encounter has to do with Mira! It could happen! She could be my fateful encounter!

You imagined Mira falling in love with you and you getting married to her. This made you blush so much that steam began coming out of your head. Natsu, Gray and Happy were watching from afar and saw you fantasizing.

Happy: Well guys, it's official. (name)'s lost his mind.

Natsu: Nah. He's probably just hungry or something.

Gray: Come on Natsu. He's obviously is nervous because of the reporter.

(name) I gotta get ready! I don't know what I should say when that happens! I know! I'll go to the book store and look up some books! I'd better get going! I'm wasting time standing around!!

And with that you raced off to the book store. Later at the book store you picked a couple books about relationships. You had already picked two books to take and were just about to take your third. Then you came across a book with big letters that said; "Fateful Encounter."

(name): What the....? No way. Give me a break. Don't tell me this what Cana meant. I'm just gonna reach for the book and the love of my life will reach for the same one right? That is how it works. Nah. There's no way that could happen. Well might as well take the book and check out.

You just reached for the book and just grabbed it when another hand grabbed the same book you were holding. You look and you see....
115231121112221111122112121.title: Lucy

1152311211122211111221121212.content: Who is it? Possibly Wendy? Just for laughs?
1152311211122211111221121212.title: Wendy?

11523112111222111112211212121.content:
You just reached for the book and just grabbed it when another hand grabbed the same book you were holding. You look and you a rather unexpected surprise. The girl that just so happened to be grabbing the book that you were grabbing was Wendy. When you saw her your heart nearly stopped.

(name) W-w-w-w-wendy?!?!?

Wendy: Oh (name). What brings you here?

(name): N-nothing! Nothing at all! Anyway, here. Take it. You had your eye on this book first right?

Mira: Well yeah, but I didn't think you'd be into that sort of thing.

You look at the cover and you nearly face faulted for what you saw. The cover was indeed called "Fateful Encounter," but the cover had a couple that was kissing and filled with lovey dovey stuff. When you saw it you remembered what Cana said and then you thought about how you met Wendy.

(name) thinking: Wait a sec! No. No it can't be! There's no way! Wendy's my fateful encounter?!?!?

You quickly gave back the book to Wendy.

(name): Dah!!! No I insist! Please enjoy! I gotta go! Bye!

Wendy: Hey wait!

Before Wendy could stop you, you raced out of bookstore to try to escape from Wendy.

(name): That was way to close. I can't believe it! I don't want to believe it! Wendy's my fateful encounter that Cana was talking about?!? No way! Absolutely not! I can't just fall in love with a kid! I gotta get out of here fast!

You didn't stop running until you got back to the guild. It was then that you realized that you forgot to read up on your research.

(name): Aww crap! I came back to the guild hall when I was supposed to be looking up research on relationships. Oh man.

Erza: (name). There you are. I was looking for you. Natsu's been telling me that you've been acting strangely. Is everything all right?

Suddenly, before you had a chance to speak, a young man with a camera burst through the door.

Jason: Yes! It's Titania! This is so cool! SO FREAKIN COOL!!!

(name) What the..... Who the heck is this guy?

Erza: (name). This is Jason. Sorcerer's Weekly's reporter.

(name): Seriously?!? This guy is the reporter?!? He's more of a fanboy than a reporter to me!

Then Jason went around interviewing all the guild members. Erza, Gray, Juvia, and even Happy all had interviews. All of them were happy to give him an interview, although there was one wizard in particular who wasn't willing to give him an interview.

Natsu: AHA!!!! So you're here again eh?!?!?

Jason: YES!!!! Natsu the Salamander!!! I've always loved interviewing you!!

Natsu: Well I don't jerk! All you ever do is write bad stuff about me! Like how I blew up this and demolish that!

Jason: So freakin cool!!! Can I shake you hand? Please sir?

Natsu: Would you shut up!?!?

And with that Natsu decked him square in the face. Jason was sent flying to the floor, but he didn't seem to care.

Jason: Wow! What a scoop! Natsu is awesome showing me his secret hand shake! He's so cool!!

(name) Either this guy's completely insane of just plain oblivious.

Then you realized something. There was someone who was missing. A certain blond haired wizard was no where to be seen.

(name): Now that think about it. Where's Lucy? I haven't seen her since this morning.

Just then the lights dimmed and the spotlight flashed on the stage and there was Lucy. She was wearing and sexy bunny girl outfit.

(name) What the hell?!? Lucy?!? What the heck is she doing dressed like that?!?

Gray: Oh brother. There she goes again.

Happy: She's always does this. She's just trying to get the reporter to interview her.

(name) Seriously?!? I understand she wants to get the reporter's attention, but there are other ways of doing it!

Lucy: Hey there everyone! I'd like to sing a little number for you-

Before Lucy could finish Gajeel came in and knocked her out of the way.

Gajeel: Outta the way blondie! I got this one! Shoobidoba!

Gray and Happy: Gajeel!?!?

(name) Oh no! Not this again!

Jason: Oh yeah!! It's Black Steel Gajeel! SO COOL!!!

Gajeel: Doin the right thing ain't always that smart. but lucky for you, you just ain't that smart. You dig me man? That means you always do right. Now listen close to me brother, cause it's coming from the soul.

Jason: SO COOL!! I can totally dig it!

Natsu: Would you shut up already?!?

Suddenly Natsu came flying from out of nowhere and decked Gajeel in the face sending him flying and crashing into the ground. Now Gajeel was p.o'd.

Natsu: I was already mad enough now this jerk! But now your song just sent me over the edge!!

Then Gajeel punched Natsu back with his iron dragon fist.

Gajeel: I've got a song in my heart and you can't stop it from getting out Salamander!!

Natsu: Oh yeah?!? Bring it on Iron Boy!!!

Once again, (and for the umpteenth time) Gajeel and Natsu started duking it out.

Mira: Hey you guys stop it! The press is still here!

Jason: Wow! This is so cool!! Two dragon slayers are slugging it out right before my eyes! No matter how many times I watch it, it always so cool!!! This will make an awesome photo spread! SO COOL!!

(name): Um yeah. Something's telling me he doesn't care either way.

Jason took photo after, after photo of the fight. He was loving every minute of this fight. Then you saw that he was getting dangerously close to the fight.

(name): Hey Jason! Be careful! If you get to close you're gonna....

But it was too late. Just when Natsu and Gajeel's punches were about to collide, Jason found himself in the middle. And he was sandwiched between their punches hard. And what was really shocking to you was still alive and that he was still in his own little world.

Jason: So cool.....they're the strongest....and the best.....dragon slayers ever.......So cool.....

Later after everything had settled down, you decided to get some air and to get away from all the violence.

(name): Man. It's a good thing I got away from all the craziness. I understand that it's always like this, but they could try to show a little restraint.

Then Cana's words about your prediction and your encounter of Wendy flashed in your mind.

(name): Come on. I gotta stop thinking about that. Besides there is no way it's Wendy! I mean she's cute and all, but she's way to young for me. And if anyone else were to find out about this, I'd die of embarrassment!

(voice) Find out about what?

You jumped in surprise to the voice. Then you turned around and you see....

115231121112221111122112121212.content:
You jumped in surprise to the voice. Then you turned around and you see Wendy. The last person who you wanted to see.

(name): Dah! Wendy!

Wendy: What's wrong? You don't seem happy to see me.

(name): No! It's not like that! Anyway what brings the you this way? I thought you were back at the guild being interviewed and all.

Then Wendy began to fidget and blush. And in turn you began to blush too.

Wendy: Um......(name)...can you....um.....could you......could you meet me tonight? By the Sola tree in the park? There's something I need to tell you.

As soon as Wendy's request pass through your brain, you felt something inside you scream. You remembered Cana's words and when you and Wendy touched hands in the bookstore. Your heart began to beat like a jackhammer.

(name) Um.....Sure I can, but....is there any particular reason why?

Wendy: All I can tell you.....is that it's important. See you!

Before you could say anything else to her Wendy ran off. You were left alone with a million thoughts rushing through your head.

(name): No way. You've got to be kidding me! Wendy turning out to be more and more like what Cana! No way! No way! I got to calm down and think! There's no way Wendy could be my fateful encounter! I need help! I don't know what to do! OK. I need to calm down. I know since things have died down in the guild maybe I can go and find a job. That's it. I'll just go on a small job and get it out of my head.

You went back to the guild and went to the request board to look for a job to take to get your mind off of Wendy. But then as you were looking at the flyers on the board you heard some of the girls talking. Cana, Levy, Lucy, and Laki were talking about the very thing you were trying to avoid.

Levy: Hey you guys! You're not gonna believe this, but I heard something about Wendy! Apparently I think she's got a crush on some guy.

Lucy: As in out Wendy?

Laki: Oh come on Levy. You got to be joking.

Lucy: Yeah. She's the last person to ever imagine getting a girlfriend. She's way too young for that.

Cana: Oh come on Lucy you never know. It could happen.

Lucy: Do you even realize what you're saying Cana? Anyway are you sure about this Levy? Maybe you misheard or something.

Levy: I know what I heard guys. Besides she's been saying stuff like "I gotta see him" or "I wanna see him."

Lucy: Him who?

Levy: Beats me. I'd love to meet the guy though.

Throughout the whole conversation your heart began to beat like a jackhammer. And as you were walking away, you were walking like an automated robot.

(name) thinking: What am I gonna do?!?! I'm the "him."!!! I mean it's not like I hate her or nothing. I just don't see her like that. We're not compatible. Then again I've never had a girlfriend before so how can I be sure of anything regarding that?

Then Wendy flashed in your mind. You imagined her looking more womanly and cuter.

(name) Hey! Let's not imagine her looking pretty like that OK?!?

Then you imagined you and Wendy arm in arm looking like a real couple.

(name) Why are all these thoughts running through my head?!?!?

As steam gushed out from your head from thinking all about Wendy and your fateful encounter prediction from Cana, you tried to think about what you should do. Then you decided to.....

1152311211122211111221121212121.content:
As steam gushed out from your head from thinking all about Wendy and your fateful encounter prediction from Cana, you tried to think about what you should do. Then you decided to go home and figure out what to do next.

(name) I need to go home. I need to take it easy and relax a bit.

After that you went to the boys side of the dormitories of Fairy Tail where you currently lived. It was a modest little place, but just right for someone who was just starting out with the guild life. Anyway when you got to your room you took a shower to help you think about your situation.

(name): Oh man. What am I gonna do? This is way too much pressure for a guy for me to take. Its obvious that Wendy is definitely gonna confess her love for me! Why else would she be blushing like that? What should I do?

You thought about how Wendy was acting when she asked you to meet her. Then you remembered what Cana said about your fateful encounter. After doing some thinking you decided to politely turn her down.

(name) I know this is probably going to make things awkward, but I have to turn her down. I'm sorry Wendy.

In your mind, you were going to turn her down, but then your heart had other ideas. You went to your closet and remembered an outfit that you kept that made you look awesome.

(name): All right! Wendy will drop dead when she sees me in my outfit. Wait a minute! What am I doing?!? I'm not supposed to be dressing up for her!!

Then once again you instinctively began to dress yourself up again.

(name): OK. Don't be dumb. What should I do? What am I supposed to do now? Hey I know! I'll do my hair! If I comb it and give it a little gel, Wendy will think I'm the hunkiest guy alive! Oh yeah! Wait!!! Why am I getting dolled up for her!?!?

In the end you ended up doing your hair yourself. Then your mind began to get wild ideas. You imagined you and Wendy by the Sola Tree. Wendy was looking pretty and womanly.

(name) Hey Wendy? I'm sorry I'm late.

Wendy: No it's fine. I'm glad you could make it.

(name): So.....you wanted to talk to me about something?

Wendy: Yes. There's something.......that I needed to tell you. Look. (name). I love you. I love you with all my heart!

(name): Are you serious Wendy?!? Are you sure?

Wendy: Yes. I mean it. I love you with every fiber of my being!

(name): I'm touched. I......I love you too Wendy!

Wendy: Really? You mean it?!? You'll accept me? I know I'm not as busty as the other girls, but I'm hoping you'll accept me for who I am.

You took Wendy's hands into yours and you two looked lovingly into each others eyes.

(name) Yes. I love you Wendy. With all my heart.

Wendy: I'm so happy! Let's have a baby or two my dear sweet (name).

(name): Yes my darling Wendy.

Then you snapped out of your daydream and slapped yourself on the cheeks. You were blushing so hard that you were like a tomato.

(name) How the hell did I dream that up!?!?!? Am I some freakin pervert?!?!?

Then you looked at the clock. It was almost time to meet Wendy. You went on your way to meet her. Your heart was beating like a jackhammer and you didn't know what to say or do. On the way you walked along the river on your way to the Sola Tree. You looked at yourself in the river and admired your reflection.

(name) thinking: There's no denying it. I'm looking good.

(name): But wait! It's not like I'm going to accept her feelings!!! I mean I like Mira and stuff!!! So why does it matter how I look?!? Besides I can't just go crushing on a girl just because of a prediction that Cana made!!!

(name) thinking: But then again, maybe going out with Wendy is the way to go. Maybe we'll end up being together forever.......Wait!!! No!! Stop thinking like that!!! Wendy is a friend!!! I've got to stop thinking about her that way!!!

Your mind was in so much in disarray that steam began spouting from your head again and your face flushed deep crimson. Then you slapped yourself to calm yourself down.

(name) OK. I need to chill. I have to just let her know that I see her as a friend. Nothing more, Nothing less.

Later you arrived at the Sola Tree. You could see Wendy standing by the tree waiting for you. When you saw her your heart began to beat more and more. You got more and more nervous.

(name): OK. Calm down. Don't be nervous. Just stay cool. Just tell her straight out.

Then you took a breath and went toward Wendy.

Wendy: (name). You made it. Glad you could make it.

(name): Y-y-yeah. Did you wait long?

Wendy: No. I just got here actually.

(name): So.......uh......what was so important that you needed to call me out here?

Wendy: Oh yes. Well.......there's something.....I need to speak with you about.

(name) Thinking: Oh crap! Here it comes! She's finally gonna say it! She's gonna declare her love for me and we'll both live happily ever after! Oh man. I'm such a pushover when it comes to this stuff!

(name) Aloud: O......K....... What is it?

Your heart began to thump in anticipation and with worry. You felt like your heart was gonna leap out of your chest. Then Wendy turned around and she......

It was a book. But it wasn't any book, it was the book that you and Wendy were both reached for the other day.

Wendy: Here! I'm so sorry.

(name): Umm, Wendy? What's going on? Why are you giving me this book?

When you heard Wendy's reason for giving you the book, you felt that your heart just stopped and your eye began to twitch. Not to mention you felt like the whole world came crashing down upon you.

(name): Wait a minute. Didn't you have something important to tell me? I mean....I heard the girls saying that you wanted to see me because apparently you had a crush.

Wendy: Oh no. I think you misunderstood. The only reason I wanted to see you was because wanted to give you that book. I never had a crush on anyone. I only just wanted to see you to give you that book and apologize about the book.

(name): I......I see.....so that's why......you just.......hahahahaha.

Wendy: Um.....(name)? Are you feeling OK? You look a little pale.

(name): That's all.....you wanted.....to see me.......about.....

Wendy: Um.....(name)? Are you sure you're OK?

Wendy: I wonder what's wrong with him? I hope I didn't hurt his feelings.

(name): What was I thinking? How could I have been such a moron? Why did I believe that Wendy was my fateful encounter?

A few days later, you were back at the request board looking for a job to take. You usually took the little jobs around town like waitressing for a restaurant, or finding a lost job. Those were good paying jobs in all, but you felt it was time for you to take a bigger and high paying job. Not only to gain experience, but hopefully to find some information on Aquadia.

Natsu: Hey Gray what's up?

Elfman: Where have you been? Haven't seen you in a while.

Juvia: What's wrong my darling? You seem troubled.

Gray: It's just a rumor floating around town, but everyone's been talking about. I came back here as soon as I heard about it. Apparently there's been a dragon sighting.

As soon as you heard the words "dragon sighting" you felt your heart leap.

Happy: Someone saw a dragon? Seriously?

Natsu: OK. Now you got my attention. Was it Igneel?

Gray: I don't know. I didn't hear any names specifically.

Natsu: Did you at least talk to the guy who saw the dragon?

Gray: Like I said, it's just a rumor. The person who claims to have seen it was a woman named Daphne. And there's more. Not only did she see it, but she also says that she actually spoke to it.

Natsu: No way! Is this true Gray?

Gray: Don't know. You'd have to go check it out for yourself. She's at The Rise Hotel in the western wastelands.

Natsu: Thanks. Let's go Happy.

Happy: Aye sir!

Wendy: Mind if me and Charle come along? I just wanna see if it's Grandeeney.

Natsu: Sure. You coming Gajeel?

Gajeel; And go on a wild goose chase with you losers? No thanks.

Natsu: Oh come on! I know you're as curious as we are.

Gajeel: Look. Stories like that are meant to sucker people in. People who fall for that crap easily like you fire breath.

Natsu: What if it was Metalicana? What would you do then?

(name): Gajeel...

Natsu: Oh come on (name). Don't be negative! You want to see Aquadia right? What if it's her?

(name):OK Natsu. You talked me into it. I'll go with you, but only because I find this whole thing a little fishy. Natsu: OK then! We're out of here! Oh by the way Gray, thanks man. Guess we owe you one.

Gray: My pleasure.

Then you, Natsu, Wendy, Carla, and Happy set off to the western wastelands. Soon you all arrived to The Rise Hotel. From the looks of things it looked like it was abandoned. It looked like a normal hotel, but to you something about this just seemed off to you.

(name): OK. Now this is definitely weird.

Happy: It does seem like its out of place huh?

Natsu: Not to mention run down.

Then you all went inside. In the hotel it was very quiet. Not a soul could be heard.

Wendy: It looks like no one's around.

(name): I wonder why? I mean this is a hotel after all. Shouldn't there be at least someone watching the desk or something?

Carla: I think it's supposed to be like this. After all, it was designed to b this way after all.

(name): What do you mean?

Carla: Take a look. (points to a lacrima on the reception desk) This place is run by a lacrima lodging system. It automatically check patrons in and out with out having to hire anyone to work the desk. But there should be at least someone maintaining the place, but I don't see anyone here.

Wendy: Maybe we can find her if we check the rooms. The lodge is automatic, so maybe she's staying in one of them.

(name): Yeah. That's true, but there's a lot of rooms. Daphne could be in any one of them.

Natsu: Well, we're not gonna find her by standing around. We're gonna have to split up and knock on all of the doors.
