Soon you came to one more door, but this one was different than the others. There were cat dolls decorating the entire door.

Happy: So far we've checked every door except this one.

Natsu: And this door is totally not suspicious in anyway. I mean come on is that a giant Happy doll?

(name): I don't even know. In any case, Daphne's gotta be here, cause this is the last one.

Natsu: Hello!! Is there anyone named Daphne in there?!? If there is, open up! We need to talk to her!

Then the door opened and there was a young woman with long black hair. She was wearing a green tank top with a blue miniskirt with cowboy boots. She was munching on what appeared to be a fried salamander of some sort.

Daphne: Yes, yes? I'm Daphne. Can I help you?

Natsu: We heard that you can help us.

Daphne: Yes, yes, yes! Helping out is what I do! And I'll help you because you're customer! Come on in!

Suddenly, magic circles deployed underneath all of you and you were suddenly brought into a dark room. Suddenly a spotlight shone and Daphne was standing on a podium with holding a bunch of the snack items like the one she was munching on.

Daphne: You're in for a real treat because I'm a wandering beauty master, spreading my talents as well as my tips throughout the land. And it's not those fake ones you see on TV. No, no, no. These are 100% real and 100% natural products that you slimming you down in weeks! Yes, yes, yes! And here it is! The product that will solve all of your weight problems and beauty! The one and only; Matamo chan!

(name): Say what?

Natsu: Beauty?

Daphne: Yes, yes, yes! This wonderful product is scientifically proven that it fights obesity and melts the pounds away with ease! If you don't believe me try some yourself! You'll definitely love the taste and the effects it'll do for ya!

(name): Wait a sec! We're not even obese! So why would we-

Daphne: Don't worry! One bite's not gonna kill ya! Take one bite and your skin will be silky smooth! Take two bites and you'll be as slim as me guaranteed!

Wendy: Wow! Incredible!

Happy: Awesome! I wanna try some!

Natsu: Wait! You're buying into this?

(name): Hook, line, and sinker.

Daphne: If you're mot convinced that this product's not for you, listen to real testimonials from real customers. "This product completely changed my life and I feel awesome!" Yes, yes!

Natsu: Excuse me....

Daphne: "I've been eating this product for ten days and I really like the results! Yes, yes!"

(name): Um excuse me....could you stop talking and.....

Daphne: And thanks to this product made me the most prettiest girl in Fiore! Yes, yes! Yes, yes, yes!

(name) and Natsu: WOULD YOU SHUT UP AND STOP SAYING YES, YES?!?!?!?

Daphne: Yes, yes sirs. Would you be interested in signing up for the fitness for the obese program?

Natsu: We're not interested in your stupid letters, your obesity, and your crazy kabobs!!

(name): The only thing that we're interested in lady is dragons!

Daphne: Yes, yes. Everyone has a preference or two. So how many pounds does your dragon want to shed? We can make a diet plan,

Natsu and (name): WOULD YOU STOP WITH DIET CRAP AND LISTEN TO US FOR TWO SECONDS?!?!?!?

Natsu: Listen. We're dragon slayers from Fairy Tail. I've been searching for a dragon named Igneel who disappeared. Wendy has been searching for one too. The sky dragon Grandeeney.

(name): And I'm also looking for a dragon. A water dragon named Aqaudia. Word on the street is that you recently met one. That's the only reason we're here get it?

Natsu: So if you know anything, please tell us.

Daphne was finally silent for once. Then she spoke.

Daphne: Yes, yes. I did say that I met a dragon. But that was a lil fib for marketing.

Natsu: You lied?!?

Wendy: That;s too bad.

(name): Man! I knew it! I knew it was too good to be true.

Carla: What a waste of time.

Daphne: Yes, yes. That's because my product is made of a primary ingredient, which happens to be dragon scales. Without that it's useless, but that's a lie too because they're impossible to get.

Wendy: So.....the whole thing is just one big hoax?

Carla: How shameless! How can you say that with a straight face?!?

Daphne: Yes, yes. A girl's gotta make a living somehow. You understand don'tcha dragon boy?

Natsu: I understand that you suck!

(name): I've had as much as I can take of this chick. Let's make like a banana and split!

You and Natsu head for the door and were just about to leave, but when they opened it the hallway wasn't there anymore. Instead there was a barrier.

(name): What the heck?!?

Happy: The hallway's melting!

Wendy: How the whole building vanish?

(name): You're asking me?!?

Daphne: You're all mine now! Like birds in a cage.

Carla: It's a barrier! You're a wizard aren't you?

(name) Then that means this was a setup! You planned this all along!

Daphne: Yes, yes, yes! and you all fell for it! Sit back and have some Matama chan!

(name): Why would I want that thing you psycho!?!?

Meawhile Wendy opened the window to see if there would be a way out, but sadly the barrier surrounded the entire building.

Carla: Looks like this trap was skillfully crafted. We're trapped.

Natsu: I've never met a wall I couldn't bring down before! I'll punch it down!

(name): I'm with you Natsu! Maybe if you hit the wall with our magic, maybe it'll come down. Though it's a long shot, it's better than doing nothing.

Daphne: Sorry water boy. you guys are going nowhere.

(name): Oh yeah? And who's gonna stop us? Let's go Natsu! WATER DRAGON IRON FIST!!

Natsu: Yeah! FIRE DRAGON IRON FIST!

Both of your punches were just about to connect with the barrier when.....
11523112111222111112211212121212211.title: A diet plan?

choices: Not listen and jump into the fray
115231121112221111122112121212122111.content:
Both of your punches were just about to connect with the barrier when both of you were repelled by a wall.

Natsu: Dowah!

(name): Hey! What the heck was that?!?

You look toward the doorway and you saw a figure standing there. Then you all heard a familiar voice.

Voice: How's the floor taste Natsu?

Then the figure stepped out from the shadows and you immediately recognized the face as well did everyone else.

Wendy: It's Gray!

Happy: Wait a second. How the heck was he able to get here in the first place?

(name): Good question. A better question would be how he got here.

Natsu: Screw the questions! I've got my own bone to pick with with this guy! Hey Gray! Next time, make sure your info isn't a complete piece of garbage! You pervy popsicle!

Gray: It wasn't garbage. You did just what we wanted you to.

Then Daphne put her arm around Gray and flirtatiously stroked his chin like he was her boyfriend.

Daphne: Yes, yes, yes. So glad you could make it, my beloved Gray.

Natsu: Hold on. Just how the heck do you two know each other? What the heck is going on?!?

(name): Natsu! Would you put two and two together? Daphne and Gray are-

Happy: Those two are in love!

(name): Would you stop saying that you stupid cat?!? I was gonna say those two are working together!

Happy: WHAAAAAT?!?

Natsu: What's the meaning of this man? You're really slumming it if you're working for this chick!

Gray: Shut up. Natsu, you and I both know that we've been at it for a long time now haven't we? If you didn't think this was gonna happen one day then you're even stupider than I thought.

Natsu: What'd you say?!?

Gray: You know what? I think it's time we settled this little rivalry. Once and for all.

Natsu: What are you talking about?

Gray: Damn you're slow. Until now, I've brought myself to you level by being nice to you. Now I'm sick of following your lead From now on, I'm following my own path now. As of now I'm through with Fairy Tail and with all of you losers.

Natsu: You can't be serious.

(name): I wish I could say he wasn't Natsu, but I think he is.

Daphne: Yes, yes. Water boy's pretty smart. And Gray really knows how to make a statement don't he? He really knows how to warm me up. Now then, Gray fetch me a dragon slayer.

Gray obeyed by taking his stance for using ice make magic and got ready to fight.

Natsu: Gray! You don't wanna do this man!

Gray: If you really believe that, just stay right there. It'll that such easier to end you!

Wendy: He seems mad.

Happy: This has to be some kind of bad dream.

(name): Hate to break it to you Happy, but this is real. Natsu, let's fight this guy together. Even Gray can't take on two dragon slayers. Let's double team this guy!

Natsu: No way. Protect Wendy and the others and leave Gray to me. I've got score to settle with this guy.

(name): But Natsu come on. Can you really take on Gray by yourself?

Natsu: Sure I can. I fought this so many times I practically know that guy. Just stay back and watch me kick the crap out of this guy.

Do you listen to Natsu or do you not listen and fight with him?
115231121112221111122112121212122111.title: something stops the both of you

1152311211122211111221121212121221111.content:
(name) OK Natsu. I'll leave things up to you. I'll stay here and watch out

for Wendy and the others. Just go kick his ass!

Natsu: With pleasure!

Gray: ICE MAKE LANCE!!!

Then the fight began! Gray fired a barrage of icicles toward Natsu, but Natsu dodged them with ease.

Wendy: He used his full strength just now!

(name): Wendy! Stay back! Don't let him get you!

Happy: Come one you guys! You two have always fought, but there's no need for this!

Daphne: Hahaha! You still don't get it do you? Gray's with me now whether you like it or not! So start fighting seriously or you're gonna be ice cubes! Gray Fullbuster! Hurry up and get me a dragon slayer!

Gray: Don't worry, you'll get one soon enough!

Natsu: What's wrong with you Gray? This isn't like you at all!

Gray: Isn't it obvious yet? What I want to know is why are you standing there and doing nothing about it you coward!

Then he fired another ice make lance and Natsu dodged it again.

Wendy: You think that this Gray could be a fake?

Carla: I suppose so. We have seen magic like that before.

(name): I don't know about that. This looks like the real Gray to me.

Happy: No! Wendy's right! This Gray has to be a fake!

Wendy: How do you know that? He seems identical.

(name): Yeah. Enlighten us Happy. How can you be sure that this Gray is a fake?

Before Happy could explain, Gray had taken off everything from his upper torso off.

Happy: Eep! He took his clothes off! This guy's the real Gray after all!

Carla and Happy: Are you kidding?

(name): You idiotic cat! It took you till Gray took off his shirt to make you realize that he's the real Gray?!?!

Gray: If you keep dodging this is gonna get boring. Come on!

Natsu: If it's a real fight you want, you know I'm always down for a brawl!

Gray: Take this! ICE MAKE BATTLE AX!!!

Natsu: FIRE DRAGON ROAR!!!

Both or their attacks collided leading to a tremendous explosion. Then Gray closed in on Natsu and landed a flurry of blows. Then he sent him
flying with a powerful upper cut. Daphne looked on quite pleased and was eating her matame-chan.

Daphne: Yes, yes. Nothing like dinner and a good brawl. As you see, this isn't a cheap imitation. This is the real Gray. I also should remind you that I'm not controlling him or anything like that. He's simply beating your face in because he wants to.

Natsu: No need to tell me that lady. I've been punched plenty of times to know that no guy can punch like Gray can.

Gray: I figured you would try testing me or something stupid like that.

Then Natsu got close to Gray and gave him a mighty headbutt and gave him another attack to the face.

Natsu: FIRE DRAGON TALON!!!!

The force was so strong, that Gray went flying straight through the wall into a hallway. Natsu followed close behind in hot pursuit.

Happy: Come on Natsu! You got this!

(name): Hey! Could you guys take it easy with the destruction already?!?

Both Natsu and Gray were now standing in the hallway in a staredown.

Natsu: All right man! You can at least tell what's going on! You owe us at least that much!

Gray: A city without sound.

When you heard what Gray said, you felt like you heard that somewhere before.

(name) thinking: A city without sound? Where have I heard that? For some reason, I feel like I've heard it somewhere before. But where?

Natsu: You're not making any sense man. Can you speak plainly please?

Gray: That's about as much plain as you're gonna get. Besides you're too stupid to understand anything. Get ready to take your last breath!

Then they both went at it again. Fire and ice were flying everywhere as you, Wendy, Happy, and Carla looked on.

Happy: Man! Those two have stepped up their game lately!

Carla: This isn't the time to be watching!

Wendy: I don't get it. Why would Gray betray us like this?

(name): Believe me Wendy. I wish I knew. I'm wondering about that myself.

Daphne: Not that it's any business of yours, but that handsome hunk offered to help me on a secret project.

(name): Secret project?

Daphne: That's right. I came to Magnolia about ten days ago to continue my research. I was digging into Natsu's background when I ran into Gray. He
liked what I was doing so he offered to help me lure Salamander all the way out here.

Wendy: OK you and Gray are partners, but what's this "city without sound"?

(name): And what does this have to do with Natsu?

Daphne: Now, now your questions can wait. In the meantime how about some Matama-chan with twenty differnt flavors?

Carla: Who could possibly want to eat that junk at a time like this?!?

Happy: Oh yeah! Get me one of the fishy flavor kinds!

Sure enough Happy had one of Daphne's Matama-chans and was now munching happily on it.

Carla: Don't you have any bit of self control?!?

Suddenly Happy's face turned red and a giant flame burst out of his mouth.

Daphne: Got quite a kick don't it? Come on take one.

(name): Damn it all! Would you stop trying to feed us that crap?!? Come on you guys! We gotta follow those two!

With that, you, Wendy, Carla, and Happy followed in hot pursuit down the stairs. Meanwhile the battle between Natsu and Gray was still raging on.
Every time one side threw the punch, the other one countered with another punch.

Natsu: If you're not gonna tell me what's going on, I'll just have to beat it out of you!!

Gray: In your dreams! You'll never get past my ICE MAKE SHIELD!!

Natsu: FIRE DRAGON TALON!!

Gray made a shield of ice using his magic, but Natsu was able to break through it using his, sending Gray down a flight of stairs. Natsu followed down the stairs, but then Gray froze the stairs turning them into a slide.

Gray: ICE MAKE FLOOR!!

Natsu slid down the stairs and went flying straight to a wall. Then Gray pounced on Natsu using his Ice Make Hammer. Natsu countered with a fireball to destroy the mallet. Gray countered again using Ice Make Canon and fired. Natsu blew the ice away using Fire Dragon Wing Attack.

Happy: At the rate this is going, this could last forever!

(name): I'll give you that one!

Natsu: FIRE DRAGON FLAME ELBOW!!

Natsu's next attack hit Gray square in stomach and both fighters went crashing through a wall and straight into a pool.

(name): Aw crap! Of all the things this room to have!

Carla: Now Gray's got the advantage!

Gray: Now I got you! ICE MAKE PRSION!!!

Gray used to water to trap Natsu inside a cage made of ice.

Natsu: Oh come on man! That's playing dirty! Come on! Let me out!

Gray: This is good for you. You belong in a cage.

Natsu: I'm some kind of wild beast! Now I'm really mad! FIRE DRAGON ROAR!!

Natsu attack busted the entire cage, but then snuck behind Natsu and fired a sneak attack using Ice Make Lance sending Natsu crashing through another
wall. Then Gray made a scythe and prepared to strike Natsu while he was down.

Gray: I think we both knew that this was gonna happen eventually. Fire and Ice don't mix after all. Say goodbye!

Natsu: Damn it! If that's how you feel, I'm not holding back!

Natsu slammed his fist into the floor causing the floow beneath him and Gray to break.

Happy: Natsu!

Carla: They're down on the next floor! Quick after them!

Then you all raced down the hall to give chase to Natsu.

(name): Darn it all! We have to do something!

Wendy: I know it's risky, but were gonna try to use our magic. I'll use my sky dragon magic and....

Carla: No child! I know you want to help, but using your magic in tight quarters like this is to dangerous.

Happy: OK then! I'll fly back to town and get some reinforcements!

(name): Happy! Wait! There's gonna be a....

Before you could finish Happy opened a window and tried to fly out, but sadly there was a barrier and Happy was sent flying straight to a wall.

(name) Can't say I didn't warn him.

Daphne: Yes, yes.There's no where to run so why don't you make yourself comfortable for a while. It's useless to resist. You see I use concealment magic which allows me to keep anyone and anything hidden for as long as I want. So if I want you to stay, you stay. On the plus side you won't have to worry about reinforcements.

You all look out the window and standing outside were Erza and Lucy.

Wendy: Hey! Erza! Lucy! We're up here!

(name): It's no use Wendy. They can't hear us up here. Thanks to this stupid chicks magic were stuck.

Happy: OK then! No choice, but to take her on! If we beat her, it'll have to break the spell!

(name) thinking: Happy's right. If we beat her, maybe her magic will go away, but should I really try this idea?

What do you do?
1152311211122211111221121212121221111.title: Listen to Natsu

choices: Head back to the guild with the others
11523112111222111112211212121212211112.content:
You were considering Happy's idea, but then Happy charged at Daphne ready for a fight. Daphne sadly stopped Happy's attack by stuffing a matame-chan in Happy's mouth.

Daphne: Here you go! Try some leafy green flavored matame-chan!

Happy: Gross!!!

Daphne: You're wasting your time. This place is my illusion, so if I want you stay you're staying whether you like it or not.

(name): Why you!

Suddenly you heard a loud boom and explosions. You look outside with Wendy and the others and you find out what the noise was. Erza and Lucy were fighting two giant lizard looking men that looked just like them and were coping they're magic and were having quite a bit of trouble fighting them.

(name): What the heck? What are those things?!?

Wendy: I don't know, but they seem to be coping their magic.

Happy: Those lizard guys must be working for her too!

Daphne: What a smart kitty cat. They're not the only ones either! I've got an entire army of artificial playthings at my disposal!

Carla: They're not even real? They must be golems then.

Daphne: That's right! I made those bad boys automatically adapt to match the attributes of their opponents. Since I was gathering info from Natsu I figured I'd get a little data from other varieties of wizards.

(name): And just what are you planning to do with all that data huh?

Daphne: Now that my dear boy is a good question. Be patient and the real show will begin. Why spoil the surprise when you'll be able to see it soon enough?

Suddenly Natsu and Gray exploded from below them continuing their fight. They were both out of breath and almost out of magic.

Daphne: My, my, my. Those two sure know how to play rough.

Gray: I gotta admit it. Out of all the fights we've been in this one the best by far.

Natsu: Yeah. I could say the same to you.

Happy: Come on Natsu! Give him one smack on the nose!

Daphne: Yes, yes. Everything's going according to plan. Now Gray! It's time to finish this little game!

Gray: No need to tell me that!

Then Natsu and Gray charged at each other again. Gray attacked with Ice Make Seven Strike Dance while Natsu attacked with Fire Dragon Swordhorn. At least they both were evenly matched, but then Natsu used all of his strength and he overpowered Gray. His attack hit him square in the stomach and sent him and Gray crashing through a wall knocking Gray out cold.

Happy: All right! Natsu won!

Carla: He definitely lives up to his reputation.

(name): You got that right. I knew Natsu was strong, but I had no idea he was this capable.

Daphne: Not bad dragon boy.

Natsu: Yo Gray! You all right man? I guess maybe I over did it a little. Oh crap! What if I did more than just knock him out?!?

Natsu ran over to Gray to see if she was all right, but then he felt cold feeling on his feet. Gray was pretending to be knocked out. Because Natsu was worried about him, Gray took that opportunity to freeze his feet to prevent him from moving.

Natsu: Aw dammit!

Gray: Idiot. You'll never learn will you?

Daphne: Yes, yes, yes! I'll take from here! HIDDEN DARKNESS!

Suddenly a dark hole appeared below Natsu fell straight into it and disappeared.

Daphne: Well done Gray! I knew I was right choosing you as my partner.

Gray: Thanks. Took at bit more work than I thought, but got the job done.

(name): No! Natsu!

Wendy: Now what'll we do?

Carla: You tricked us! It was never your intention to fight him in the first place! You were luring him into a trap!

Gray: Yup. He may be strong, but I at least use my head.

Happy: You cheater! The only reason you beat him because you played dead!

Then Gray grabbed Happy and hung him over the hole where Natsu fell into.

Gray: You can join him if you want furrball!

Happy: Hey! Let me go!

(name): Leave him him alone! WATER DRAGON IRON FIST!

You attacked Gray to get him to let Happy go. He did, but at the same time he dodged your attack. Daphne then came between you two and stopped the fighting.

Daphne: Stop fooling around Gray! We got bigger fish to fry. It took this much effect just to capture him and get the important piece of my experiment.

Wendy: Now I get it. Trapping Natsu was your goal the whole time!

Daphne: Yes, yes. Now my research is complete. Now it finally begins. Concealment magic off!

Suddenly the whole building began to shake and fall apart. Carla and Happy carried you and Wendy to safety. Then a giant dragon-like creature came out of the ground. Daphne's voice boomed throughout the area.

Daphne: Finally it's alive! Activating lacrima core! Transmitter set! Everything is good to go! Salamander heart engaged! With the Salamander acting like the blood of this wonder specimen, my baby is unstoppable! Now my dragonoid! ACTIVATE!!!!

As the dragon roared, you felt someone else screaming and that someone was Natsu.

(name): Now I get it! She's using Natsu like a battery! She's gonna drain every magic power out of him!

As you and Wendy landed safely, Erza and Lucy ran toward you.

Erza: We're glad you guys are OK!

Lucy: We were worried about you!

(name): Lucy! Erza!

Wendy: How did you beat those lizard men?

Erza: No time for that! Where's Natsu?

(name): He's inside that dragon thingy! This crazy girl named Daphne set us up and Gray helped her!

Wendy: And that's not all. He's not being controlled or manipulated! He's doing this of his own free will!

Erza and Lucy: What did you say?

Then all you look and there on top of the dragon's head was Gray.

Erza: What is the meaning of this!?! If you've betrayed Fairy Tail! There had better be a good reason!

Gray: Sorry. I don't have a reason. If you want to stop us then be my guest. Then again considering how weak you all are, I doubt you'll be able to be around to see the dragonnoid's full power.

Daphne: yes, yes, yes! After countless years of blood, sweat, and tears I've finally produced the ultimate dragonoid! If anything you could've at least congratulated me on a job well done.

Erza: So you're the one who's behind all this?!? Release Natsu or else!

Daphne: Sorry, but I have no intention of letting him go. After all he is the battery of my dragonoid. You might as well say your goodbyes while you have the chance because he won't be around much longer.

(name): What do you mean by that?

Erza: Magic power is a wizard's life source. If we don't get him out of there, Natsu will be finished!

(name): Are you serious?

Lucy: You messed with the wrong guild lady! Let him go!

Daphne: Like I said,there's no way I'm letting him go. Besides in order to operate the dragonoid, I'd have to get my hands on dragon slayer magic. So Natsu's staying right here.

Erza: And why have you made this monstrosity? Clearly not for show.

Daphne: You're a smart cookie Erza. I want to create the ultimate dragonoid! Sadly, this one is a prototype so I need to do some testing. Luckily I found the perfect test subjects!

Then the dragon raised it's foot and stomped on you and the others, but luckily you all it just before it crushed you all. Then you all heard a honk and a car screeched out of nowhere and raced toward you. Driving it was Macao and Elfman and Wakaba were with him too.

(name) Hey look!

Elfman leaped from the car and punched Gray in the gut knocking him out cold.

Elfman: Sorry, but Gramps wants you back Gray.

Erza: Just in time Elfman. Did master send you?

Elfman: Yeah. Since he found out about Daphne, he sent us to take Gray to Gramps and he'll decide what to do with that thing once he's talked to Gray.

Suddenly the dragonoid began to take flight and was flying toward the city.

(name): Guys look! If we don't stop that thing, it'll get to Magnolia in no time!

Erza: Listen up! You all need to get back to guild and prepare for action. We have to protect Magnolia no matter what.

Lucy: Erza what about you?

Erza: I'll try to take care of the dragonoid.

(name): Erza! Are you crazy?!? There's no way you can take that thing on by yourself. Not without any backup!

Erza: I'll be fine. I can take care of myself! Now get moving! That's an order!

Lucy: OK. Let's go Wendy!

As the rest of the gang left for Magnolia you.....
11523112111222111112211212121212211112.title: Other

115231121112221111122112121212122111121.content:
As much as you wanted to stay and help Erza, you knew that she was right. The people of Magnolia came first. You followed the others back to the guild. When you all got back to Magnolia you helped evacuate all the citizens to the guild. Unfortunately the dragon was slowly approaching. It would be at Magnolia in a manner of minutes.

Cana: Look! Fake dragon dead ahead. Man it's huge.

Droy: I don't suppose anyone's figured out how to stop that thing.

Jet: Hey Mira. Master's got some kind of strategy right?

MIra: Yes, but he wants to wait till he has a chance to talk to Gray.

Cana: What good is that gonna do? We don't even know if Elfman and the others still have him or not. We can't just sit here twidling our thumbs!

Levy: and can we really protect the town and stop that thing?

(name): We have to Levy. And we must. We're just gonna have to hope that Erza stops that thing and wait.

You went back to the guild and decided to wait for further instruction. Then you saw Mira. She was sitting on the table with a worried expression on her face. You decided to go ease her worries.

(name): Hey Mira. Are you OK?

Mira: Oh (name). I'm fine. I'm just worried.

(name): About Elfman? He's your brother if I'm not mistaken.

Mira: Yes.

(name): Don't worry. I'm sure that he's OK. I mean he is your brother after all.

Mira: I hope your right.

Just then Levy raced into the hall.

Levy: Mira Jane! Elfman and the others are back, but they got roughed up pretty bad!

You and Mira raced to Elfman, Wakaba's, and Macao's aid.

Cana: Hurry up! Get these guys some medical attention!

Mira: Elfman! Are you OK?

(name): Dude what happened to you?

Elfman: We were attacked by these weird lizard that copied our abilities.

(name): So Daphne sicked her lizard men on you guys too? In any case, Laki can you take Elfman to get fixed up?

Laki: Sure.

Elfman: Hold on. I can still.....gah!

Mira: Take it easy Elfman. Let us do what we can to help you.

Elfman: OK, but listen Mira. You have to save Natsu. I owe it to him after everything that he's done for me. Bring him home. For all of us.

MIra; Don't worry. He's as good as saved.

Then Elfman fell over unconscious.

Mira: Elfman no!

(name) It's no good Mira. He's out cold.

Wendy: Don't worry. I'll heal him with my sky dragon magic.

Mira: Thank you Wendy.

Then you see Cana shaking Gray in anger.

Cana: Hey you! You don't get to sleep on the job. Why don't you admire your handiwork you pathetic traitor!

Before you try and stop Cana, Juvia stepped in and stopped Cana instead.

Juvia: Stop it. My beloved Gray would never turn his back on Fairy Tail. What happened to hearing both sides of the story before accusing someone? I have faith in him even if the rest of you don't!

Then Gray gently placed his hand on Juvia's shoulder to calm her down.

Gray: That's enough Juvia. It's alright. You're supposed to take me to see Gramps right? Unless you want to sit here and talk all night I'm ready when you are.

Alzak: Fine start walking.

Bisca: No funny business. Got it?

As you watched Alzak and Bisca leaving with Gray. you suddenly remembered what Gray said about the city without sound.

(name): Alzak! Bisca! Wait a sec! Let me go with you guys!

ALzak: Hold on. How come?

(name): There's something I need to confirm. And Gray is the only one that can confirm it. I can't say, but it's only something that I need to talk to with Gray alone.

Alzak: OK then. Follow us.

So Alzak and Bisca led you and Gray to Makarov's quarters. Later you, Gray and Makarov were alone.

Makarov: (name)? Why are you here?

(name): I'm here for the same questions you have, but the main reason is I have a question for Gray that needs to be answered.

Gray: And what's that?

(name): What is the city without sound? And what does Natsu have to do with it?

Then....
115231121112221111122112121212122111121.title: Head back to the guild with the others

1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.content:
Suddenly there was a loud rumble and the roar of the dragonoid could be heard.

Makarov: It looks like the battle has begun. Now would be a good time to explain yourself.

Gray: I take full responsibility. I didn't expect this.

Makarov: WHAT DID YOU THINK WAS GONNA HAPPEN?!?

When you heard Makarov yell you felt your heart jump. You knew he was frightening before, but now he was even more frightening. You were even more surprised that Gray still kept his composure in front of Makarov.

Gray: Look gramps. Only Natsu can beat that thing. He's right where he needs to be to make that happen. Listen, I was working on a job when I heard the rumors. Someone was trying to build an artificial dragon. So I decided to look into it.

Makarov: And that's when you had this rendezvous with this reckless fool?

Gray: Her plan was entirely focused on capturing Natsu and using him to power that fake dragon. I don't know if she knew, but she told me something that was important. Once it awakens the only way to stop it is to have a dragon slayer destroy it from the inside.

(name): That would make sense, but also you could've prevented this if you didn't hand Natsu over to Daphne i the first place.

Gray: Look (name). I had to. You're missing part of the story. There's a city counting on us. It was for their sake.

(name): Wait, does this have anything to do with the city without sound?

Gray: You got it.

(name): Well tell us. What does this have to do with Natsu?

Makarov: Yes. Go on my boy.

Gray: Natsu made a promise to the people in the city without sound, but he forgot because he's an idiot. Self control isn't exactly his strong suit. So I used to check up on him after he finished a job to make sure everything was OK. Whenever he heard word of Igneel, he would get distracted and he completely forget about the task at hand.

Makarov: So you felt the need to remind him that finding Igneel is important, but fulfilling his obligation to the guild is even more important?

Then Gray clenched his fists and had a serious look on his face.

Gray: I never had the chance to prove myself to my master Ur, but there's no limit for him. Every challenge that was put before him, he over came it. I know that if he found him, he would beat Igneel! He always has that. He can always be ready for that day when it comes! But he needs to get stronger and stronger because he's the only person I can prove myself to! But I messed up. I thought he would have no problem beating this thing. Please let me fix this.

There was along silence then you spoke by putting your hand on his shoulder.

(name): If you're gonna need to help cleaning this mess, count me in.

Gray: What? But why....

(name) I can see how determined you are. And how much Natsu means to you as a friend. Call it a man's intuition, but my guts telling me to trust you. Besides I owe Natsu. After all he's the doofus that got me in this guild in the first place.

Gray looked at you and smiled. Then you both bumped your fist as a sign of friendship. Makarov sighed with exasperation.

Makarov: Very well. But you two must promise to do exactly as I tell you.

(name) Have you got some kind of plan gramps?

Makarov: Yes I do. And don't worry. This plan will work. Just make sure you do as i say.

Then Makarov began telling you and Gray his plan.

Meanwhile...
1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.title: Gray explains (flashback)

1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.content:
Meanwhile back outside everyone else in the guild was holding their own against the dragonnoid. Even Erza who had joined up with the guild couldn't even land a scratch on the dragonnoid. Wendy was standing by healing all the injured and the wounded. She had just finished healing Elfman when she fell over about to faint.

Lucy: Wendy! Are you OK?

Wendy: I'm fine, but I may need help getting to other people who need treatment too.

Carla: Absolutely not! I forbid it! If you keep using your magic to heal people your own life will be at risk!

Wendy: If that's what happens then so be it. I'm not a baby anymore Carla. I'm a Fairy Tail wizard and I'm gonna act like one whether you like it or not!

Carla was silent, and then she sighed.

Carla: What stubbornness. I don't know where you get from.

Lucy: We're all Fairy Tail wizards, so let's take that thing down and rescue Natsu!

Then you arrived on the battlefield.

(name): If you guys want help rescuing Natsu, count me in!

Wendy: (name)!

(name): I overheard everything you said Wendy and I gotta say you have a lot of guts as well as the rest of the guild. I may be new in Fairy Tail, but I can see you guys really care for Natsu. He may have made me join this guild, but I'm glad he did. For that I owe him not only as a member, but as a friend. So let's beat this overgrown lizard and get Natsu out of there! Who's with me?!?

Everyone: Yeah!!

Suddenly Makarov's stern voice echoed throughout the guild.

Makarov: Not so fast! The well being of this guild and the town of Magnolia are tied together. Preventing the destruction of Magnolia as well as destroying the dragnnoid takes top priority above anything else.

Lucy: But Master! If we do that then what's gonna happen to Natsu?

Happy: We can't destroy it with him still inside!

Makarov: I'll say it as clear as I can. As the master of this guild, I'm order you all to stop the dragonnoid before it can destroy the town at any cost. And Natsu will be fine. That boy is as tough as nails. If anyone can survive through things like this he can.

After that Makarov left. There was a long and awkward pause. Then Erza called out.

Erza: Natsu! We've been ordered by Master Makarov to destroy the dragonnoid by any means necessary. But before that I need to know what you want us to do.

Then you and rest of the guild could hear Natsu's voice coming from the dragonnoid.

Natsu: It's about time someone asked that. OK. Clear the gunk out of your ears and listen up, because I'm only gonna say this once. Forget about me! Destroy this thing with me in it!

(name): Say what?!? Are you out of your mind Natsu?!? If we did that what's gonna happen to you?!?

Natsu: Just do it would ya?!? If Magnolia were to be destroyed because of me, I would never forgive myself!

The dragonnoid was stomping through town. Everyone was firing their best magic attack at it, but still nothing worked.

Alzak: Damn it! Nothing's working!

Levy: We don't stop that thing, it's gonna destroy the whole city!

Lucy: Please tell me you got some kind of plan to stop that thing Erza?

Unfortunately, Erza said nothing. Meanwhile at the cockpit of the dragonnoid Daphne was enjoying herself enormously.

Daphne: What a rush! It totally rocks! It really takes me back to my childhood. Such wonderful memories! I never forget what I saw that day. It was beautiful. Powerful! So majestic. And ferocious. It was the most incredible thing I've ever seen. I kept waiting for it to come back, but it never did. So I thought if I wanted to see one again, I would have to make one with my own two hands!

Natsu (inside dragon): OK lady, I've just about had it with this crap! You think you're the only one waiting around for a dragon?!? I am too! Gajeel, Wendy, and not to mention (name) too! That makes us in the same boat doesn't it?!?

Daphne: You dreamed it up they told me. There's no such thing they said, you're crazy they said! What I saw was real! No matter what I said they never believed me. They laughed at me, turned their backs at me, and told me that dragons never existed! But I knew that they were wrong. It was so frustrating! I'm sure you know what it's like right? Yes, yes, yes! Now I can show them! Show them a dragon that everyone can see! First I'll show them how my dragon can destroy an entire city and then an entire country!

Happy: Well's it's official. This girl has flipped her lid.

Lucy: The whole thing is crazy!

(name): I know. But in a way I kinda feel sorry for her.

Then Gray appeared right next to you.

Erza: Gray!

Gray: OK. Let me just say I completely screwed up. I underestimated Natsu's strength. But I need you all to listen to me, even though you won't believe what I have to say.

Cana: And why should we believe you?

(name): Easy Cana. Just listen to Gray. I know Gray helped Daphne, but he had good intentions. Gramps and I heard him ourselves, so just listen.

In a few minutes, Gray explained everything and when he finished everyone was shocked as well as annoyed.

Lucy: Are you serious? How could he forget something that important?

Erza: I swear! No matter what happens he never learns!

Juvia: Oh my beloved Gray! I'm so relieved! I just knew that you'd always be true!

Gray: This was the only I can think of way to make things right. But right now we gotta deal with Daphne.

Erza (thinking): I don't understand. Why would the master tell us to attack the dragonnoid when he knows that Natsu's the only one who can destroy it?

Erza pondered and then she understood and in a brilliant flash of light, she requipped into her Heaven's Wheel Armor. Meanwhile dozens of Lizardmen appeared from the sky.

Gray: Erza let me explain what Gramps told me.

Erza: I know. I figured it out. The rest of you focus your attacks on the Lizardmen. I'll take care of the dragonnoid.

Lucy: Wait are you sure? Natsu's still inside that thing!

Erza: We can't defy the master's will. Therefore it's the will of Fairy Tail. Protect the city at any cost. If we have any pride we must be prepared to protect it at any cost.

Everyone: RIGHT!! LET'S DO IT!!

Gray: (name). Juvia. I need you to come with me. (Juvia blushes) (name) you too. (Juvia depressed).

(name): Me? What for?

Gray: Just trust me. I need you and Juvia to make this work.

(name): OK. You got it Gray.

And with that you followed Gray and Juvia. Then......
1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.title: Back that the battlefield

choices: Later at the rooftop far away from the battlefield
1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.content:
Inside the dragonnoid, Natsu was trying to figure a way out of the dragonnoid. Sadly he wasn't having much luck and his body couldn't even move. To make matters worse, the dragonnoid had absorbing so much of his magic, he was close to passing out.

Natsu: Damn it! Come on! No matter what I can't pass out!

Then heard voices.

Voice 1: It's useless man. You should just give up.

Voice 2: No way1 You're still in this so don't give up!

Natsu: Hey! Who's there?!?

Natsu opened his eyes and looked for the source of the voices. Then he saw them. There above his head was two mini versions of him. One was dark and the other light.

Natsu: What the....!! NO WAY!!!!

Light Natsu: Gimmie a break! Like you know what Daphne's talking about!

Dark Natsu: Hey! I'm not the bad guy here. You're the one that the promise we made!

Meanwhile back at the battlefield, everyone was doing their best on fighting of all the lizardmen. Erza was trying to find a weak spot on the dragonnoid so she can save Natsu. Then all of a sudden the dragonnoid let out a ferocious roar and then things began to get strange. The dragonnoid began to speak in Natsu's voice!

Dragonnoid (Natsu): RRRRAGGGGGHHHH!!!!! Guys you gotta stop me! I mean you'll never stop me!!!!! I'm gonna destroy everything!!!

Cana: What the heck?!? He's starting to crack up!

Lucy: What the heck is going on?!?

Then Bixslow took off his helmet and used his figure eyes.

Bixslow: I tell you what's going on. He's at the breaking point! The dragonnoid monster is close to absorbing Natsu's spirit. If we don't get him out of there he's done for!

Dragonnoid (Natsu): Destroy!!! I mean destroy me!! I mean... Oh man! I don't even know what I mean anymore!

Inside Dragonnoid
Light Natsu: Wow. Looks like Erza's really fired up now.

Dark Natsu: You can say that again. We'll have to destroy her too!

Light Natsu: But she's a good friend of ours, we can't do that!

Dark Natsu: Let's put her on the ground. Don't be so soft!

Outside Dragonnoid
Natsu: Grrrrr!!!!! WOULD YOU TWO SHUT UP!!! If you two are gonna argue at least get out of my head first!!!

Mira: (sweatdrop) Oh my.

Lucy: Sounds like he has a screw loose. In any case, where the heck are Gray, Juvia, and (name)? We sure could use their help right now! We can't keep holding off those lizard men forever!

Then.....
1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.title: other

1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.content:
Later a few feet from the battlefield you, Gray, and Juvia gathered on the rooftop for Gray's plan.

Juvia: Now what my love?

(name): Yeah Gray. Is there any particular reason why were all the way out here?

Gray: Yes. We should be in that things blind spot over here. She won't even know what hit her.

Juvia: What do you mean by that?

Gray: (name). Juvia. Listen up. I need the kind of help that only you two can give me. If we pull this off Natsu just might make it out of there alive. I wouldn't want it any other way. You can't have Fairy Tail without Natsu. That can't even be a possibility!

Juvia: You're so passionate my beloved!

(name): Yeah, yeah we get it. Just tell us how we're gonna help Natsu while were all the way from up here!

Gray: We're gonna help Erza and everyone else by taking out all those lizardmen at once. We're doing a unison raid. A triple unison raid.

(name): A triple unison raid?

Juvia: Can we do that?

Gray: Yeah. We're ice and water after all Juvia. When you and I first fought I remembered thinking our styles of magic would seem to compliment each other.

Juvia (blushing): R-r-really?

Gray: And (name) you're a water dragon slayer. With you also being water you should be able to give our combined attack the power boost it needs.

(name): You do make a good point there, but are you sure that we can do it?

Gray: I know we make it happen, but we have to work together on this. So can the two of you do it? Please. I need both of your help.

There was a moment of silence and then Juvia spoke and took Gray's hand.

Gray: I will. I won't let you down my love.

(name): Yeah and you can count me in too. Let's do this!

Then Gray and Juvia took a stance like they were doing the tango and you held on to both of their shoulders. Then three magic circles appeared above the three of you and all of your magic fused together.

(name), Gray, and Juvia: MAGIC FUSION!!!! TRIPLE UNISON RAID!!!

Giant spouts of water erupted from Magnolia's river and shot into the sky. Then the water froze and formed a storm of needles and ice dragons that rained down on all the lizard men and destroyed them instantly and left the your guild mates unharmed. Even the dragonoid was hit the attack. Everyone was amazed.

Jet and Droy: What's happening?!?

Levy: It's a giant curtain of ice! With ice dragons!

Dragonoid (Natsu): WOOOWW!!!! WHOOO!!!! That's cold!!!

Lucy: This magic power. It feels familiar for some reason.'

Carla: It's an ice and water unison raid! No....a triple unison raid!

Mira Jane: Did Gray, Juvia, and (name) do this? Amazing!

(Back on the rooftop)
Gray: Thanks a lot you two.

Juvia: It makes me so happy to know that you'd anything to save your friends, even put your life on the line. Oh Gray. Oh my love....!

When Juvia turned around to gaze into Gray's face to praise him, she found that you were the only one standing next to her.

(name): Um Juvia? You do realize that Gray left a little while ago right?

Juvia: Say what?!? Gray my love! Don't run away from me!

(name): Come on Juvia! If you don''t move it, we'll leave you behind!

And with that you followed Gray back to the battlefield where the dragonoid was. Then as you followed Gray you heard him call out to you.

Gray: (name)! You remember the plan right (name)?

(name): Yes, but are you sure that this'll work? Won't this make him even more crazy?

Gray: Don't worry. Just follow my lead and don't let up. Got it?

(name): OK. If you say so.

And with that you followed Gray to execute the plan.
1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.title: Later at the rooftop far away from the battlefield

1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.content:
Meanwhile Inside Dragonoid
Dark Natsu: There he goes again! Always stealing the spotlight from me!

Light Natsu: You can't help that he's awesome. Not to mention that newbie (name)'s pretty awesome too.

Dark Natsu: Forget that! We should give those two a stomping!

Natsu: SHUT UP!!!

Outside the dragonoid
Dragonoid (Natsu): This is making me so mad I should just crush everything!!!! No I shouldn't!! I mean yes I should!!! What the hell's wrong with me?!?

Everyone who saw this sudden outburst was a bit weirded out. Even Erza was a bit......perplexed.

Happy: Natsu's finally gone nutso.

Lucy: Short trip if ask me.

Then Gray appeared on one of the rooftops close enough for Natsu to hear him.

Gray: Hey! Listen up you pink haired freak! Are you seriously that weak? It's pathetic! I should've known that you were nothing, but hot air! We're getting real tired of this comedy act so man up already!

Dragonoid(Natsu): What'd you say?!?

Then you appeared next to Natsu on another rooftop.

(name): You heard him you fire breathing moron! I mean come on! Are you really that defenseless?!? Are meaning to tell me that all that stuff I heard about you being a strong dragon slayer were nothing but a lie?!? You're such a disgrace!

Dragonoid(Natsu): Watch it water boy!!

Happy: Hey! This isn't the time to be mean!

Lucy: Yeah! Come on you guys!

Lucy and Happy were confused, but then they both began to catch on as to what you and Gray were up to.

Gray: You know a real Fairy Tail wizard never forgets a promise! You making the guild look like were a bunch of liars! Come on! Show em how we really do it!

(name): Yeah! Smash that lame excuse for a dragon into pieces!

Daphne: Yes, yes. So you show your true intentions Gray Fullbuster, but you're too late. Soon Salamander will absorbed by my creation. Who needs those lizardmen when I have this instead?

Happy: I'm disappointed in you Natsu!

Dragonoid(Natsu): What?!?

Happy: I mean what's your problem? I thought you were the kind of guy that crushed everything in your way! So you're gonna let this fake dragon beat you?

Lucy: Come on! Everyone in Fairy Tail needs you and you're just gonna give up? We all expected a lot more from you, but I guess you decided to take the easy way and quit!

Inside Dragonoid
Natsu: What?!? Come on Lucy! You don't need to get so personal!

Light Natsu: That was totally uncalled for man!

Dark Natsu: Add her to the stomping list!

Then Erza joined the insulting game.

Erza: They're right Natsu. I understand you were caught off guard, but you lost heart so quickly.

Dragonoid(Natsu): No I didn't! I give up! No way never!

Erza: You said to destroy the dragonoid with you inside. That's the very definition of giving up. It's nothing more, but a display of weakness. Allow me to give you what you asked for. I'll put you out your misery personally! I'm sure if your precious dragon saw you again he'd be ashamed of you.

Dragonoid(Natsu) Grrrrrr!!! GIVE ME YOUR BEST SHOT!!!! YOU AND ME RED!!!! IT"S TIME TO PARTY!!!! I'VE BEEN WAITING FOR THIS FOR A LONG TIME!!!

Then the dragonoid went berserk. The red core that was sparking like mad and the magic power began to leak out of it. Soon magic power began to leak throughout the dragonoid's body and Daphne was beginning to lose control of the power.

Daphne: No, no, no! At this rate the dragonoid won't be able to take much more!

Then Erza swooped in, requipped into her purgatory armor and struck the dragonoid's red core with her giant spiked mace. The core cracked a little, but it didn't break.

Gray: Damn it. Don't tell me that's all she's got!

(name): Man! We need more power!

Then Gajeel came on the scene.
Gajeel: Man he's an idiot. I tried to warn him, that this would happen. I mean I know that he's a lava brained idiot, but this is taking it way to far. It's time to make him shut up and to stop being a nuisance! DRAGON SLAYER SECRET ART!! KARMA DEMON IRON SPIRAL!!

Then Gajeel leaped into the sky and his legs turned into a giant drill at pierced the dragon's center and broke open setting Natsu free. When Natsu regained his senses he was staring at Gajeel who was right at his side.

Gajeel: Well this didn't work out like I planned. I was hoping to sneak in the middle of the confusion and beat the crap out of you.

Natsu: Heh. Is that so?

Gajeel: Hey! Lucy! Call that horse spirit of yours! We need to get some flames over her ASAP! In fact, all of you, conjure up as much flames as you can to feed Salamander!

Lucy: Right! Let's do it! Ready everyone?!?

Everyone: Yeah!

Everyone used the most powerful fire based spell they can think of and Natsu downed all of it in a flash.

Natsu: Oh yeah! Now I got a real fire in my belly!

Gajeel: That stupid chick tarnished the dragon's reputation for their nobility and grace. So teacher a lesson she'll never forget.

Natsu: Exactly what I was thinking. I'M ALL FIRED UP!!!!!

With all that added power Natsu went on a furious rampage!

(name): Oh man. I knew he was strong when he's mad, but this is a little much.

Makarov: His driving force will always be righteous anger.

Mira: Oh hi master.

Makarov: If you want Natsu to pull through, to overcome any situation no matter the cost. Make him angry. It's surefire way to give him the motivation he needs.

Lucy: No kidding!

Makarov: I told you and Gray to make Natsu extremely mad. Then it seems that Erza figured it out. Keep a close eye on him (name). You're about to see a real Fairy Tail wizard in action. Carrying out our most sacred duty in the guild. Destroying evil.

Meanwhile Natsu was still rampaging and soon he found Daphne and unleashed one final attack, destroying the dragonoid, defeating Daphne, and breaking her spell on the city without sound.

(name): Wow. Incredible.

Gajeel: It looks like the Dragonoid's weakness.....

Gray: Is an unstable power sourse.

(name): I guess so but......

Natsu: Hey Gray! What's the big idea putting me through all of that?!?

Gray: It's your fault for breaking promises!!

Everyone laughed even you. Then you looked into the sky and smiled.

(name) thinking: Wow. These guys may fight a lot, but everyone relies on each other for support and guidance. I gotta say I'm coming to like this guild. Even though they're crazy.

Then Lucy called you.

Lucy: Hey (name)! You coming? We're going back to the guild.

(name): Hey wait up! I'm coming!

And so you went back to the guild with your friends ready for the next adventure.
1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.title: Continue

1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.content:
It was another day at the guild hall. You were lounging around having nothing to do. Then Lucy came up to along with Natsu and Happy.

Natsu: Hey there (name)! Watcha doin?

(name): Nothing much. Just sitting here. What about you guys?

Happy: We're gonna go fishing!

(name): Fishing?

Natsu: Well yeah. We gotta feed our tummies somehow right Happy?

Happy: Aye sir!

(name): Anyway what about you Lucy? You're gonna join them?

Lucy: Well I was gonna go with them, but them these two clowns wanted me to tag along with them.

(name): Haha. I see.

Natsu: You wanna come with us? We could use an extra pair of hands.

Happy: If you do, I'll give you some of my yummy fish.

(name): I appreciate the offer, but I'm not to fond of fish.

Natsu: Oh come on man, don't be like that.

Happy: Pretty please? I'll raise my offer to three fish if you come.

Lucy: You really think that's gonna make him come along?

You were just about to answer when Mira Jane came up to you.

Mira: Hey there (name).

(name) blushing: Oh Mira Jane!

Natsu: Whoa! (name)'s face is all red!

Happy: That's cause he loooves her.

(name): That's really getting old cat! Anyway what's up Mira Jane?

Mira: Actually I could use your help (name). I'm gonna go to the archives to sort some things and I could use an extra pair of hands.

Natsu: Aww no fair Mira! We were asking (name) something first!

Lucy: Come on Natsu that's not up to you to decide.

So who do you go with? Mira or Natsu?
1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.title: Next......

1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.content:
(name): OK Mira. I'll help you out.

(name) thinking: This'll be a great opportunity to get to know Mira and to score a few points.

Natsu: Aww! Come on (name)! Don't be such a downer man!

Lucy: Come on Natsu. If (name) wants to stay and help, then let him. Besides, you're practically dragging me along so at least you'll have some company.

Happy: The only reason he wants to is so that he could spend some time with Mira. Cuz he loooovves her!

(name): Oh shut up will ya?!?

Mira: OK then. Follow me (name).

And then you followed Mira to the Fairy Tail archives where all of Fairy Tails records were stored. It was like a library with thousands of books.

(name): Whoa....I've never seen so many books! And you need to reorganize this stuff?

Mira: Yup. Gotta keep things nice and neat. Now come on, we better get started.

(name): OK....

(name) thinking: Oh crap. This is gonna be torture. On the plus side maybe I can try to talk to Mira and get to know her and stuff.

You and Mira got started sorting out the books and papers in the archives. While you were sorting, you caught a few quick peeks at Mira. She was so beautiful. Her fair skin, her long silver hair, and (most of all) her outrageous curves.

(name) thinking: Oh wow. She's so beautiful. No one can compare to this beauty.

Then Mira's voice snapped you out of your thoughts.

Mira: Hey (name).

(name): Dah! Y-Yes?

Mira: How are you liking life in the guild so far? (placing a book on the shelf)

(name): Well, I can't really complain I guess.(climbing up ladder and placing book on shelf) Everyone's pretty cool. Hahaha. Although, Natsu could try to be a little more mature.

MIra: But that's what makes him so sweet.

(name): Are you serious?

Mira: Of course. You're attracted to Natsu's charms too right? After all he is the reason you joined the guild.

(name) Say what?!? No...whoa....YAAAAHHH!!!

Because of you were on top of the ladder, you lost your balance and fell on the floor. You were in a pile of books and papers. Mira quickly rushed to your side.

Mira: (name)! Are you OK?

(name): I'm OK. I just fell. Hahaha. Sorry for making such a mess.

Mira: It's fine. I'm just that you're not hurt.

Then in the pile of books that you were laying on, you something that caught your eye. It was an old painting of a bunch of familiar faces.

(name): Hey. What's this?

Mira: Hey. I remember that painting! Reedus painted this a long time ago.

(name): Hey Mira. Is this a painting of everyone when they were younger?

Mira: Yes. It is.

(name): (looks at Cana and Gray in painting) Wow. That's Cana and that looks Gray. (looks at Wakaba and Macao) Macao and Wakaba look so young! (looks at Natsu) Heh. I recognize that pink haired dope anywhere. Natsu's hardly changed at all. (looks at Happy) And.....what's with the blue dragon?

Mira: Oh that's Happy.

(name): Say what?!? Why the heck is he a dragon?

Mira: Well....why not? It's cute isn't it?

(name): Uh.....never mind. (looks at Erza) That's Erza (looks at Makarov) and that's definitely Master Makarov and.....(looks at Elfman) what the....no way....is that Elfman?

Mira: Yes it is.

(name): But he looks so......non manly.

Mira: Hahaha. I know. Everyone was a little different when they were kids.

(name): You ain't kidding. (looks at Mira) Hold the phone. Who's this girl? She looks like a rebel. (looks close) Hey Mira, is she a relative of yours like a sister perhaps?

MIra: Nope. That's me.

(name): SAY WHAT?!?!? Are you for real?!? You have to be joking!

Mira: Nope. I'm not joking. That's really me. Surprised?

(name): Yes! I mean, you look totally different than you were back then! It's a little hard to believe. (looks at Lisanna) If that's you, then who's this?

Mira: That's my sister Lisanna. She died a couple years ago.

(name): Oh. I'm so sorry to hear that.

Mira: It's OK. I don't mind.

You knew your conversation was heading toward a sad direction, so you decided to change the subject.

(name): So how long ago was this painted and what was it like back then?

Mira: Well let's see..... Back then I hadn't been a member for very long when the picture was painted.

How should the flashback be told? Short or long?
1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.title: Mira

1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.content:
Then Mira began telling the story of her childhood from when she was with the guild. Everything was still the same. Natsu was always fighting with Gray and Erza was always breaking up their fights. The only thing that was different was that Mira was always picking a fight with Erza which again shocked you.
Then she told you about how Happy came to the guild and how Natsu and Lisanna took care of him when he was an egg. Which made you a little puzzled.

(name): Hey Mira. Do you know where Happy came from? I mean did he have a mom or dad or something before Natsu found him as an egg?

Mira: To be honest, I don't know. All I know is Natsu found him in the East Forest. No one really knows for sure where Happy came from.

Just then Elfman came into the room.

Elfman: Hey Big sis. It's time to go.

Mira: OK. I'll be right there. Sorry (name). I have to go somewhere OK?

(name): OK. I'll see you later.

After that Mira left to join Elfman leaving you by yourself looking at the painting. You looked at the many different faces on the painting. Then you looked at Lisanna in the painting.

(name): Wow. It must have been hard losing a sister like that. I would've loved to meet her. I wonder what she was like. Maybe the other guildmates would know. I can probably even ask Mira. I better catch her before she leaves.

And with that you went back to main guild hall. When you got there you were startled by the sounds of lightning. You looked outside to see that it was raining outside.

(name): Man. For a minute it was all sunny second ago. When the heck did it start raining?

Then you heard the sound of crashing, bashing and yelling. You looked to find that Natsu and Gray were fighting again. Only Natsu had a lot of drawings on his face. You sat next to Lucy, Levy, and Cana watching the brawl.

(name): Oh brother. What are those two fighting about this time?

Lucy: Gray doodled on Natsu's face because he was getting annoyed pf Natsu's snoring. Natsu woke up, figured out it was Gray and now those two are brawling.

(name): I thought it something that stupid.

Juvia (looking at Natsu and Gray): Oh my beloved Gray. He's so gallant like a knight fighting for his true love.

(name): Has anyone seen Mira? I wanted to ask her something.

Cana: She went to the church with Elfman. (drinks from a giant barrel) Ahh. Rainy days are best cuddling with your boyfriend.

(name): Uhhhh. I.....see. Anyway why would Mira and Elfman visit the church in this weather? I mean it's pouring cats and dogs out there.

Cana's face then turned solemn and a little sad.

Cana: The anniversary of Lisanna's death is coming up. They always spend a lot of time at the church when it comes up.

(name): Oh. I see. Actually Cana that's what I wanted to ask you and the others about.

Cana: About Lisanna?

(name): Yeah. I was wondering what was she like? And how did she die?

Levy: Well for starters, she went on a job with Mira and Elfman two years ago, but didn't make it back.

Cana: She was a girl that was a tenderhearted. In fact, she was best friends with everyone in the guild. Including Natsu.

(name): Wow. I had no idea. It must've hard on both of them. I would've loved to meet Lisanna.

Lucy: Yeah. I can relate. I would of loved to meet her too.

Cana: Hey. Now that I think about it. (name) and Lucy both remind of Lisanna a little, but mostly Lucy.

Levy: It's because they get along with Natsu so well.

(name): Well I wouldn't go that far.

Then Gajeel came in. His face was covered in scratches and cuts like he got into a fight.

(name): Hey Gajeel! What happened to you? Got into a fight with a cat or something?

Gajeel: Shut up would ya?

And Gajeel stormed off.

(name): What's with him?

Levy: Who knows?

Lucy: Man. I'm so bored.

(name): You can always take a job Lucy.

Lucy: Nah. Besides it's raining.

Levy: It's hard to feel motivated when you're stuck inside. Besides you should take a load off once in while (name).

(name): If you say so.

Lucy: (sigh). I wish something interesting would happen today.

Lucy would soon get her wish because suddenly time seemed to have stopped, then everything went white. When you came to, you were laying down on something soft. You slowly opened your eyes and sat up.

(name): Oh man. What the heck just happened?

Then you surveyed the area around you and your eyes opened wide in shock. The area that was once the guild hall, in fact the whole town that was once Magnolia was nothing more, but a desert with floating bubbles. You looked up and you saw that the sky had a dark and round like appearance in the clouds.

(name): What the hell happened here? Where is everyone?

Then you heard a familiar voice. You followed the voice and it led you to.....
1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.title: Short

1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.content:
A few days after the incident, you were finally getting used to everything in the guild. You were still doing small jobs, but eventually you took some of the more higher paying jobs. You tagged along with some of the guild members on the quests, but you at least got some experience. Soon you were handling quest on your own like a pro and you were loving it. One day you had just completed a quest and had come back to the guild. Then you ran into Natsu, Gray, and Erza.

Natsu: Yo! (name)! Welcome back man!

Gray: You just come back from a quest?

(name): Yup. Easy as pie!

Erza: Seems you're used to handling quests on your own now.

(name): Yeah. It took a while getting used to, but now I love going on quests. Especially the ones where I have to find the escaped convicts. That's where the real jewel making is at.

Just then Cana and Levy came up.

Levy: (name). You're starting to sound like Natsu. With all the fighting and stuff.

Cana: Yeah. Keep that up and you're gonna scare the ladies away.

(name): Oh come on Cana. Give me a break. It's not like I'm trying to scare anyone away. I just like testing my abilities that's all. Besides, I don't exactly have anyone I want to impress.

Cana: Anyone except Mira Jane.

(name): Cana!

When you heard Mira's name you couldn't help, but blush.

Levy: You have a crush a Mira? You're kidding.

Cana: Yup! He's head over heels for her.

(name): Cana! Be quiet!

Then Happy came sailing in.

Happy: You loooooove her!

(name): Would you just shut up you furball? That's really getting old.

Levy: Aww don't worry about it (name). I think it's cute that you like Mira, but you do have your work cut out for you.

(name): What do you mean?

Cana: For one thing Mira's the cover girl for Sorcerer Weekly. She's the most popular girl in our guild.

Levy: And all the boys are all over her. Including some in the guild. If you started going out with Mira, they'd go crazy with jealously.

(name): R-really?

You began to imagine yourself going out with Mira. Then an angry mob of men were chasing after you and beating you up.

(name): Oh man. That would be bad.

Levy: But still, I would love to see you and Mira go out. You two would seem like a good couple.

(name) blushing: Y-y-you really think so Levy?

Cana: Of course she does and I agree with her. You should go up to her and ask her out on a date!

(name): A d-d-d-date? No way! I mean...I'm sure Mira has better things to do rather than time with me.

Natsu: Oh come on man! All you gotta do is go up to her and ask her like this. "Hey Mira! Come on and fight me!"

Gray: You fire breathing dork. He's not trying to ask Mira to a fight. He wants to ask her on a......

Before Gray could finish got up in his face and glared.

Nastu: Who are you calling a dork you freezing exhibitionist?!?

Gray: I'm calling you that! And you don't even know what that word means you magma brain idiot!

Natsu: You wanna fight?!?

Gray: Get ready to have your ass beat!

Once again the two have started fighting again.

Erza: Honestly, do those two ever stop? Anyway (name), I agree with Cana. It never hurts to ask. I'm sure Mira will comply.

(name): Um....thanks Erza.

Levy: See? If Erza says that you have a chance, than it must be true. Just go for it.

Feeling reassured by the encouraging words you felt a lot more confident.

(name): Thanks guys. I think I'll go for it and ask her. But....what do I say? I mean I'm not exactly good with this sort of thing.

Erza: Ah! I've got just the thing to help you (name)! I'll be right back!

Before you could ask Erza raced off.

(name): What the... What's with Erza? She's acting even stranger than usual.

Levy: Oh boy. (name). I think you better run.

(name): Why do you say that Levy?

Levy: Well....when it come to helping someone with romance Erza kinda goes over the top.

Cana: I'll say.

Before you could wonder what Levy and Cana were talking about.....
1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.title: And then.....

choices: Juvia walking by herself acting suspicious
1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.content:
Before you could wonder what Levy and Cana were talking about Erza came back. Only this time she was carrying a big stack of books.

(name): What the heck?

Erza: Here you go (name)! These should be able to help you.

She then shoved the books in your arms. They were so heavy that you couldn't keep your balance and you ended up falling flat on your butt.

(name): Ow....

Levy: (name)? Are you OK?

(name): Yeah. Erza. What the heck is all of this?

Erza: Just a few books. They all have detailed information to your problem.

Cana: A few? She practically brought a whole library.

(name): Um....thank you Erza, but I don't think I'll be able to read all of these at once.

Erza: I must insist! I want to help you overcome this trial! You may have joined the guild in a short amount of time, but I consider you a good lifelong friend. Friends are always there no matter what the cost.....

As Erza kept rambling on and on about friendship all you could do was sit there and listen. Then Cana and Levy whispered to you so Erza couldn't hear.

Cana: You see? Once Erza's gets like this, there's no stopping her.

(name): You weren't kidding. Is she always like this?

Levy: Yeah. She means well, but she has a habit of going a little over the top.

(name) I'll say.

Erza: WHICH IS WHY....!!!

Suddenly Erza's voice suddenly boomed which caused you as well as Levy and Cana to jump in surprise.

Erza: I would appreciate it if you would read these books for research! So you could one day meet your own true love! I can understand if you don't need them...I only wanted to assist you.

(name): Um....no. It's OK. I'll take the books. Thank you for the help Erza.

Then Erza took your hands and began shaking them like crazy like a two handed handshake.

Erza: Thank you! I knew you'd understand! Friends sure are wonderful aren't they?

(name): Yes! They are! Take it easy with the shaking would you?!?

Erza: Now then. I best be off. Good luck with your problem! Go! Fight! Win! Go! Fight! Win!

And with that Erza went away cheering like cheerleader.

Cana: I told you so.

(name): No kidding. I've never seen Erza like that before.

Levy: Yup. She's always like that.

A little later you carried your books to your room in the boys dorm in Fairy Tail. The books were a little heavy, but you managed to get them to your room. After that you headed back to the guild hall to see if you could find a job.

(name): Man. I know Erza means well, but there is such a thing as restraint. Then all of the guildmates have got something crazy about themselves. Hahaha. But that's what I like about this guild. There's never a dull moment.

Then you noticed something. You see....
1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.title: Erza comes back

1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.content:
You see Juvia walking by herself. She was looking around acting suspiciously which made you curious.

(name): I wonder what Juvia is up to? Only one way to find out.

So you walked to Juvia and called out to her.

(name): Yo! Juvia! Whatcha doin?

Juvia was so surprised that she almost jumped 3 feet.

Juvia: Dah! M-mr. (name). Wh-what a surprise! What brings you this way?

(name): I was just on my way back to the guild. What are you doing?

Juvia: Um...nothing! I was just um browsing through town. Certainly not doing anything suspicious if that's what you mean.

Now you were feeling a little suspicious. You couldn't help, but eye Juvia suspiciously.

(name): Juvia. What are you up to? You're acting a little weird.

Juvia: Me? Weird? Of course not! I'm just fine. And I'm certainly not going to go get a love potion to get Gray to fall in love with me.......

There was a long and awkward silence and Juvia blushed beet red.

(name): Wait. Did you say a love potion?

Juvia having had revealed her true intentions reluctantly gave up.

Juvia: Yes. I did. I'm trying to get my beloved Gray to notice me.

(name): And you think that a love potion is gonna get him to notice you? Sorry, but that seems a little crazy to me. Is there even such a thing like that?

Juvia: That's what I'm intending to find out. There's a potion shop in town that makes those kinds of potions. I'll go to that store and get my hands on one. And then I'll finally get my beloved to say the words I've been longing to hear!

(name): Oh brother.

Juvia: By the way Mr. (name). I have recently heard that you are in love with Ms. MIra Jane am I correct?

Now it was your turn to blush.

(name): Wh-wh-what?!? Where did you hear that?!?

Juvia: Oh. I've recently heard it from a few people in the guild. Apparently you're quite smitten with her.

(name): W-w-well I wouldn't go as far as to smitten, but I....I....um.....

Juvia: I have an idea. Why don't you come with me? Maybe we both can go together and find the potion that we need to get our loves! Then we both will have everlasting love!

(name): Um......I don't know.......

Do you go with Juvia or no?
1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.title: Juvia walking by herself acting suspicious

1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.content:
(name): OK. I guess I'll go with you, but only because I want to check out of this love potion thing is legit.

Juvia: Very well. Just follow me.

And so you followed Juvia. She led you down to a couple of streets and and dark alley ways. On the way, it began to rain. You didn't mind it since you were a water dragon slayer. You loved the water. Juvia had no worries either since she had her umbrella. Soon you both came to the potions shop. It was a normal shop that had the words Mag Drug on it and had a heart on the left and a skull on the right. When you saw it, you couldn't help, but feel a little creeped out.

(name): Umm Juvia? Is this the place? It looks kinda creepy.

Juvia: Yes it is. Right this way. Drip, drip, drop.

Juvia went inside the store and you followed. Inside there was a an old man mixing a couple of potions together. You looked around at the other potions in the shop while Juvia made her request to the old man.

Old man: Ah. Welcome you two. What brings you this way?

Juvia: I need one of your special potions that will make a boy notice me.

Old man: A potion to make a boy notice you eh? And what about you boy?

(name): Um...don't mind me. I'm with her.

Old man: Well young lady, my potions can't be tailored to such specific needs.

Juvia: Please sir. If he could gaze into my eyes passionately just once, that'll be more than enough.

The old man thought and he thought. Then he reached behind him and pulled out a violet colored bottle with an ox's head on top of it.

Old man: Try this. It'll do exactly as you asked.

Juvia: What's this?

(name): Looks kinda creepy looking?

Old man: This will make sure that the boy you like burn with a passion only for you. For sixty thousand jewel.

(name): Sixty thousand?!? That sounds a little pricy to me!

Juvia: Yes. It does seem a bit expensive.

Old man: Eh who cares what you think boy? Did I forget to mention it's one hundred percent effective?

Juvia: One hundred percent? Of burning passion? I'll take the whole bottle!

(name): Juvia are you sure about this? I mean, is it worth spending sixty thousand jewel for?

Juvia: Yes. As long as Gray gazes passionately into my eyes and loves me, it is worth it. So how exactly does this potion work?

Old man: All you have to do is blow the bubbles toward the person you desire and make sure he inhales them. Once successful the man you desire will become aware of the feelings you have deep inside of your heart if your feelings are strong enough.

Juvia: I understand. Thank you very much sir.

Old man: What about you boy? Do you have a potion in mind?

(name): No thanks. I wanna see for myself if your potions work. So I won't be buying anything yet. If this potion works, then we'll talk.

And with that you and Juvia left and headed back to the guild. Then.....
1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.title: Go with Juvia

(name): Ahhhh!!!!!! Juvia! You hit Mira! Not to mention you hit a few other people in the guild! You have the worst aim ever!

Juvia: It's not my fault! My beloved Gray won't stop moving around!

(name): But at this rate, everyone in the guild is gonna be in love with you except Gray!

Juvia: Don't worry! This time for sure! Gray my love! Feel my love!!!

Juvia took the stance of a baseball pitcher and fired the bubbles at Gray one more time! This time they hit the mark. Just as Gray sat down and yawned the bubbles entered right in his mouth.

Juvia: Yes! I did it!

(name): About time, but did it work?

Suddenly Gray came walking toward you and Juvia blushing beet red and......
1152311211122211111221121212121221111211.title: At the guild

Juvia prepared herself for a loving embrace from Gray and you watched waiting to see what would happen. It looked like Gray was coming towards Juvia, but instead he walked right past her and walked up to a certain blue colored feline. He now had a look of jealousy on his face.

Meet you! Your name is Andrew "Andy" Valencia, and you are a Water Dragon Slayer. You are about 5'11", and are lean, muscular and quite attractive. (Think of Sting.) Other things to note about you is that temperatures really do not bother you. Unless it is a blizzard or an extreme heat wave, you are fine. It helps that you can cool off very easily.
